SA15dhkpvsvu:803: sakṛd api tathā adarśanāt kāryaṃ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:808: na hi yasya yam antareṇa bhāvaḥ sa tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:810: bhavati ca dhūmo agnim antareṇa tan na tad-hetuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:813: tulyatvāt / tad-abhāve apy agnau bhavati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:818: na vai sa eva bhavati tādṛśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:819: bhāvāt / anya-adṛśād bhavan kathaṃ tādṛśaḥ syāt / tādṛśād hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:822: abhāvān na hetu-bhedo bhedaka iti akāraṇaṃ viśvasya vaiśvarūpyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:828: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:830: sa hi dhūmo ahetur bhavan nirapekṣatvān na kadācin na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:836: yogyatayor deśa-kālayos tadvattā itarayor niyama-ayogāt / sā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:839: deśa-kālayor vartamāno bhāvas tat-sāpekṣo nāma bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:840: tathā hi / tathā vṛttir eva apekṣā tat-kṛta-upakāra-anapekṣasya tan-niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:841: ayogāt / tan niyata-deśa-kālatvād dhūmo atra dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd
SA15dhkpvsvu:842: vaikalye ca punar na dṛṣṭaḥ taj-janyo asya svabhāvaḥ / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:849: api bhāve na sa tasya svabhāva iti sakṛd api na janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:850: na vā sa dhūmo adhūma-janana-svabhāvād bhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:852: ca sa eva agnir ity avyabhicāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:853: agni-svabhāvaḥ śakrasya mūrddhā yady agnir eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:854: atha anagni-svabhāvo asau dhūmas tatra kathaṃ bhavet //36//
SA15dhkpvsvu:856: adhūma-hetor dhūmasya bhāve sa syād ahetukaḥ //37//
SA15dhkpvsvu:858: kathaṃ tarhi idānīṃ bhinnāt sahakāriṇaḥ kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:862: kiṃ tu sāmagrī janikā tat-svabhāvā / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:863: anumīyate / sa eva ca sāmagrī svabhāva-sthity-āśrayaḥ kāryasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:864: ata eva sahakāriṇām apy aparyāyeṇa jananam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:876: svabhāvas tasya tad-hetur ato bhinnān na sambhavaḥ //38//
SA15dhkpvsvu:879: kāryakāraṇabhāva-siddher bhavati tatas tat-pratipattiḥ / na anyathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:881: amūrtatve nityatva-darśane apy anyatra anyathā adṛṣṭeḥ / kvacin
SA15dhkpvsvu:882: nityatva-abhāve apy adṛṣṭasya punar dṛṣṭer iti bhavatu kāryasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:886: yo hi bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāvas tatra avinābhāvo bhāvasya iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:887: tad-abhāve svayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvaḥ syād abhedataḥ //39//
SA15dhkpvsvu:888: ya eva bhāvo bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāva ity ucyate / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:890: sa ca ātmānaṃ parityajya kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:891: ya eva tarhi kṛtakaḥ sa eva anityo bheda-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:893: hetuḥ syāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:896: tasmād yato yato arthānāṃ vyāvṛttis tan-nibandhanāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:898: tasmād yo yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ sampratīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:899: na sa śakyas tato anyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ //42//
SA15dhkpvsvu:907: tad eva hi syād abhinnasya bhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:909: ca abhāvāt / tasya eva ca punar bheda-virodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:916: na hi sambandhinā apy anyena anye samānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:925: bhūta-vat / tad-darśinyāḥ sā bhrāntir iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:935: sajātīya-abhimatād anyasmāc ca vyatiriktāḥ svabhāvena eka-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:937: śabdais tatas tato bhedam upādāya svabhāva-abhede apy aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:939: te api śabdāḥ sarva-bheda-anākṣepe apy eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:946: tad-bhedāt / yāvat yaś ca vyāvṛttayas tāvat yaḥ śrutayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:950: tasmāt svabhāva-abhede api yena yena dharmeṇa nāmnā yo viśeṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:951: bhedaḥ pratīyate na sa śakyo anyena pratyāyayitum iti na eka-arthāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:953: tan na pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur iti / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:954: punar etad gamyate vyavacchedaḥ śabda-liṅgābhyāṃ pratipādyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:959: ko anyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syād yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate //43//
SA15dhkpvsvu:967: na hi yo yad ekayogakṣemo na bhavati sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:977: yadi dṛṣṭa-sarva-tattvasya api bhāvasya tathā niścaya-pratirodhinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:980: ākāraḥ / na hi śuktau dve rūpe samānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:991: yāvanto asya parabhāvās tāvanta eva yathāsvaṃ nimitta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:992: bhāvinaḥ samāropā iti tad-vyavacchedakāni bhavanti pramāṇāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:998: tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa eva akhilo guṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:999: bhrānter niścīyate na iti sādhanaṃ sampravartate //45//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1002: vastu-grahe anumānāc ca dharmasya ekasya niścaye /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1003: sarva-dharma-graho apohe na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate //46//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1006: api vastu vidhinā pratyāyayati na vyavaccheda-kṛt tadā eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1008: antara-avṛttiḥ na hi tasmin niścite tadātmā aniścito yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1009: yadā punar anumānena samāropa-vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadā na eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1010: samāropa-vyavacchedād anya-vyavacchedaḥ kṛto bhavati iti tad-artham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1012: nanu na avaśyaṃ viparyāsa-pūrvaka eva apratīta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1014: yathā akasmād dhūmād agni-pratipattiḥ / na hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:1019: bhede vā asambaddhasya tatra apratipattir iti / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1020: tatra api tad-darśinas tat-svabhāva-aniścayaḥ kutaḥ viparyāsāt / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1021: ca taṃ pradeśaṃ tad-viviktena rūpeṇa niścinvann agni-sattā-bhāvanā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1022: vimuktayā buddhyā katham aviparyasto nāma / tad-ākāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1023: samāropa-saṃśaya-rahitaś ca tat-pratipattau na liṅgam anusaret /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1026: anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhāv asiddhaṃ kim ataḥ param //47//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1028: kvacid dṛṣṭe api yaj jñānaṃ sāmānya-arthaṃ vikalpakam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1031: tat katham asati samārope bhavad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1034: sthiraḥ sātmaka iti vā na tatra bhede niścayo bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1036: na hi sarvato bhinno dṛṣṭo api bhāvas tathā eva pratyabhijñāyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1039: yatra tu pratipattur bhrānti-nimittaṃ na asti tatra eva asya tad-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1051: tāvantā eva śabdāś ca tena te bhinna-gocarāḥ //50//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1052: anyathā ekena śabdena vyāpta ekatra vastuni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1053: buddhyā vā na anya-viṣaya iti paryāyatā bhavet //51//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1055: yasya api nānā-upādher dhīr grāhika-arthasya bhedinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1056: yo api manyate bhinnā eva upādhayaḥ parasparam āśrayāc ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1059: tad ayam aprasaṅga iti / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1061: sarvātmanā upakārasya ko bhedakaḥ syād aniścitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1062: yady apy upādhayo bhinnā eva śabda-jñāna-antarāṇāṃ nimittam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1063: arthe / sa tu tais tadvān eka eva upalīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1066: grahaṇe ka eva upādhi-bhedo aniścitaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1068: grahaṇāt / na hy upakārakatvaṃ anyad eva tasya svarūpeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1071: grahaṇaṃ tad eva upakāratvena api iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1074: eka-jñāne dvayor api grahaṇam iti eka-upādhi-viśiṣṭe api tasmin
SA15dhkpvsvu:1079: na hy anya eva anya-upakārako yo na gṛhītaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1081: tathā gṛhīte upakārya-agrahaṇaṃ tasya apy agrahaṇa-prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1084: atha api syād bhinnā eva śaktayaḥ śaktimato yābhir upādhīn
SA15dhkpvsvu:1085: upakaroti / tato na ayaṃ prasaṅga iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1086: dharma-upakāra-śaktīnāṃ bhede tās tasya kiṃ yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1087: na upakāras tatas tāsāṃ tathā syād anavasthitiḥ //54//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1088: yadi pratyupādhy upakārakatvāni tasya na svātmabhūtāny eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1090: kiṃ tasya iti tā ucyante / upakāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:1091: vā svātmabhūtābhir ayam ekaḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktīr upakurvan
SA15dhkpvsvu:1092: eka upādhinā api gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhyata eva / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1096: sarvāḥ śaktīr grāhayati tāś ca sva-upādhīn iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1097: prasaṅgaḥ / atha tā api śakty-upakāriṇyaḥ śaktayo bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1098: bhāvāt / evam upādhīnāṃ tac-śaktīnāṃ ca aparā parāsv eva śaktiṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:1099: aparyavasānena ghaṭanāt sa ekas tābhiḥ kadācid apy agṛhītas
SA15dhkpvsvu:1106: śabdair anākṣepān na syāt tatra pravṛttir iti vyarthaḥ śabda-prayogaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1107: syāt / arthakriyā-āśrayo hi sarvo vidhi-pratiṣedhābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1108: upādhayaś ca tatra asamarthāḥ samarthaś ca na eva ucyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:1110: tataś ca upādhayo na upādhayaḥ syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1111: kvacit pravṛttau hi kasyacit pradhānasya aṅga-bhāvāt tad-apekṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1113: tasya śabdair anākṣepān na te kasyacid aṅga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1116: prasaṅgaḥ / sa tāvat tair upādhibhir nāntarīyakatayā upalakṣyamāṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1117: ekena apy upalakṣaṇe sarvātmanā upalakṣita iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1118: prasaṅgaḥ / ko hy atra viśeṣaḥ śabdā vā enam upalakṣayeyus tal-lakṣitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1122: eka-upakārake grāhye na upakāras tato apare /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1123: dṛṣṭe tasminn adṛṣṭā ye tad-grahe sakala-grahaḥ //55//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1125: yadi bhrānti-nivṛtty-arthaṃ gṛhīte apy anyad iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1126: syād etat nirbhāgasya vastuno grahaṇe ko anyas tadā na gṛhīto
SA15dhkpvsvu:1127: nāma / sa tu bhrāntyā na avadhāryata iti pramāṇa-antaraṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1129: tad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ siddhaṃ tadvat tato aparam //56//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1136: niścaya iti samāropa-abhāve vartamāno anyāpoha-viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1138: yan na niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham //57//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1139: iyam eva khalu niścayānāṃ svārtha-pratipattir yat tan-niścayanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1140: tac ced ākāra-antara-vad aniścitaṃ kathaṃ tair gṛhītaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1141: katham idānīm aniścīyamānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhītaṃ nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1150: niścinvato apy anyatra aniścayena pravṛtti-bhedād grahaṇa -agrahaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1151: tasmāt tad eva asya grahaṇaṃ yo niścayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1154: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sarvato bhinne vastu-rūpe
SA15dhkpvsvu:1155: anubhava-utpattāv api tathā eva na smārto niścayo bhavati / sahakāri-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1158: yad viśeṣa-avasāye asti pratyakṣaḥ sa pratīyate //58//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1159: yady apy aṃśa-rahitaḥ sarvato bhinna-svabhāvo bhāvo anubhūtas
SA15dhkpvsvu:1160: tathā api na sarva-bhedeṣu tāvatā niścayo bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1168: janakatva-adhyāpakatva-aviśeṣe api pitaram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā me
SA15dhkpvsvu:1170: so api bhavan niścayo asati bhrānti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1172: tasmān na abhūta ity eva sarva-ākāra-niścayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1173: tatra api ca anyavyāvṛttir anyavyāvṛtta ity api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1174: śabdāś ca niścayāś ca eva saṃketam anurundhate //59//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1175: tatra apy anyāpohe na vyāvṛttir anyā anya eva vyāvṛttas tad-vyāvṛtter
SA15dhkpvsvu:1178: abhāvaḥ / tasmād yā eva vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva vyāvṛttaḥ / śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1181: nanu ca vācya-viśeṣa-abhāvāt saṃketa-bhedo apy ayukto dvayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:1183: tathā ca vyatirekiṇyā vibhakter ayogas tasyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1186: bhinnam artham iva anveti vācye leśa-viśeṣataḥ //60//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1187: na vai śabdānāṃ kācid viṣaya-svabhāva-āyattā vṛttir icchāto vṛtty-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1189: te yathā vyatirikte avyatirikte vā prayoktum
SA15dhkpvsvu:1190: iṣyante tathā niyuktās tam artham pratibandhena prakāśayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1191: tena gaur gotvam ity eka-artha-abhidhāne api kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1193: vibhaktir artha-antaram iva adarśayantī pratibhāty anartha-antare
SA15dhkpvsvu:1196: anyatra api puruṣa-icchā-vaśāt pravṛttasya pratibandha-abhāvāt / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1197: ekaṃ kvacid eka-vacanena khyāpyate tad-aviśeṣe api gaurava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1201: tad apy asty eva / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1206: tathā ākṛta-saṃketena śabdena prabodhyata anaśvatvam asya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1207: iti / yadā punar vyavaccheda-antara-anirākāṅkṣas taṃ jñātum icchati
SA15dhkpvsvu:1209: tathā aprakāśanāya prayuñjate anaśvo ayam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1223: śabdayor na tayor vācye viśeṣas tena kaścana //62//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1224: tasmān na sarvatra dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye arthe
SA15dhkpvsvu:1230: jijñāpayiṣur arthaṃ taṃ taddhitena kṛtā api vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1231: anyena vā yadi brūyād bhedo na asti tato aparaḥ //63 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1232: etāvantam eva ca bhedaṃ darśayaṃs taddhitena vā darśayet
SA15dhkpvsvu:1233: pācakatvam iti kṛtā api vā pāka ity anyena vā tathābhūta-jñāpanāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1241: na vai pākena anya eva kaścit pācako nāma abhidhīyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:1243: yat punar asya abhidheyaṃ tat kathitaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1244: tad eva pācakatvena api ity alam apratiṣṭhair mithyā-vikalpaiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1245: yathā ca na artha-antara-bhūtā kriyā asti tat-samavāyo vā tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1248: pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syād doṣo jāti-tadvatoḥ //64//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1249: yad āhuḥ / anyāpohe api śabda-arthe tad-viśiṣṭasya abhidhānāt tadvat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1250: pakṣa-uditaḥ sarvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ samāna iti tad apy anena prativyūḍham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1251: tatra hy artha-antaram upādāya anyatra vartamāno dhvanir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1254: vyāvṛttir vyāvṛttād dvayor eka-abhidhānād ity uktam / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1267: dhvaniś ca aniṣṭa-parihāreṇa pravartayati ity anyāpoha-viṣaya uktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1273: na hy anyo dharmo dharmiṇo anartha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1282: abhāvāt / nanu ca dharma-dharmiṇor abhede bhede vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1283: dṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṣṭhy-ādi-vibhaktayo dharma-bahutvāt tatra dṛṣṭo vacana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1289: yadi nāma ete śabdāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacit praṇinīṣitā api na śakyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:1292: syāt kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhy-ādaya iti / yadā punaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1295: na hi vyatireke ṣaṣṭhī bāhulye jas-ādaya ity etad api puruṣa-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1297: tu tatra tathā prayuñjata iti tatas tathā pratipattir bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1298: evam anyatra api kathaṃcit taiḥ prayuktās tathā eva pratīti-hetavo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1299: bhavanti / tatra vācyeṣu puruṣa-āyatta-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānām avastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1305: na hi dharma-dharmiṇor bhede tattva-rūpatve vā sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1311: khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ ca ity atra vā kiṃ nibandhanam //67 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:1312: yadā ekā api strī dārā ekam api sikatā-dravyaṃ sikatā iti vyavahāras
SA15dhkpvsvu:1313: tatra kiṃ bāhulyaṃ yena evaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1315: sarvatra utsannam idānīṃ eka-vacanam eka-śakter abhāvāt / yatnaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:1319: tad ayaṃ nirvastuko niyamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1336: na syāt / dvayasya paraspara-sahitatā iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1342: arthe abhinnā śaktir asti sā nimittam iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1347: upakāre vā śakty-upakāriṇyā api śakter vyatireka ity anavasthiter
SA15dhkpvsvu:1349: tad-avyatireke vā ādyāyām api prasaṅga iti yat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1353: na hi tatra sāmānyam asti na api vibhutva-ādayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1361: api vācyāḥ / na hi tatra sāmānyaṃ saṃkhyā saṃyogo vā sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1362: katham idānīm asaty atiśaye khasya svabhāva iti na tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:1365: śabda-pravṛtti-nibandhanaṃ rūpaṃ tathā jijñāsāyām evam ucyate /

SA15dhkpvsvu:1999: apy adhyavasāya-vibhramād vyavahārayati lokam / sa tu

SA15dhkpvsvu:2005: vastu-sāmānya-vādino api hi bhinnā eva vyaktayaḥ /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2022: tathā api tad iha iti syāt / na samāna
SA15dhkpvsvu:2023: iti / tad eva tāsāṃ sāmyam iti cet /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2044: apy udaka-āharaṇa-ādikam ekaṃ ghaṭa-ādi-kāryaṃ tad api pratidravyaṃ

SA15dhkpvsvu:2054: kasyacid ekasya karaṇāt atat-kāri-svabhāva-vivekaḥ / tad api

SA15dhkpvsvu:2067: na hi dṛśyaṃ vibhāgena apratibhāsamānam asti ity uktam etat

SA15dhkpvsvu:2074: eva yuktaḥ / yo ayam anyonyaṃ viveko bhāvānāṃ tat-pratītaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2075: eva saṃketo api kriyamāṇaḥ śobheta atat-kāri-vivekena pravṛtty-arthatayā /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2083: vastu-bheda-āśrayāc ca arthe na visaṃvādikā matā //112//

SA15dhkpvsvu:2097: tata eva ca sā śrutir anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2106: yady avṛkṣebhyo bhedo vṛkṣas tasya avṛkṣa-grahaṇam antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2107: tathā grahītum aśakyatvāt avijñāta-vṛkṣeṇa avṛkṣasya api tad-vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2108: rūpasya aparijñānāt buddhāv anārūḍhe arthe na saṃketaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2110: teṣām avṛkṣāḥ saṃkete vyavacchinnā na vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2111: ya evam ekaṃ vastu-sāmānyam abhyupagamya itaretara-āśrayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2116: vyavacchinnāḥ kathaṃ jñātāḥ prāg vṛkṣa-grahaṇād ṛte //115//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2117: na hi tadā pratipattā vṛkṣaṃ vetti na avṛkṣaṃ taj-jñānāya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2125: na hi saṃkete para-avyavacchedena niveśitāc śabdād vyavahāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:2129: avidhāya niṣidhya-anyat pradarśya ekaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2130: vṛkṣo ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate tat prapadyate //117//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2131: vyavahāre api tena ayam adoṣa iti cet /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2137: eva ayam arthaṃ tat-sambandhinaṃ vā vyavahāre api pratipadyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:2142: ayam apy ayam eva iti prasaṅgo na nivartate //118//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2143: ekaṃ pradarśya ayaṃ vṛkṣa ity api bruvāṇo ayam apy ayam eva ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2145: tayoś ca sa eva doṣaḥ / na doṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2148: tad-ākāra-vivekinīṃ buddhim anubhavatas tato anyad iti yathā-anubhavaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2150: ayam eva vṛkṣa iti pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2152: paśyati tam eva avṛkṣaṃ svayam eva pratipadyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2156: ananvayād darśanena pratipattau vyakty-antare api na syāt tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2157: pratītiḥ / evaṃ tarhi tatra api tulyam etat / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2160: niveditam etat prāg yathā ete bhāvāḥ prakṛti-bhedino api jñāna-ādikam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2161: ekaṃ kāryaṃ kecit kurvanti na anya iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2163: eva tad-hetūn atad-hetūṃś ca vibhajya pratyeti / tasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2166: bhedena pratipadyeta ity uktir bhede niyujyate /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2172: ete vṛkṣā iti sva-para-vikalpeṣv eka-pratibhāsān ādarśya vikalpa-

SA15dhkpvsvu:2178: na punar ekaṃ vastu tatra dṛśyam asti yasya darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2181: agrahaṇāt / agṛhītasya ca apara-pravibhāgena anupalakṣaṇāt / ākṛter
SA15dhkpvsvu:2182: apy ekatra dṛṣṭāyā anyatra draṣṭum aśakyatvāt /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2205: vā udaka-ānayanaṃ yathākathaṃcid abhimataṃ syāt udakam

SA15dhkpvsvu:2212: anuṣṭhānaṃ vā abhimataṃ tadā ānayety api na

SA15dhkpvsvu:2225: upanītaś ca na eva kaścit jñeya-ādi-śabdo asti /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2253: tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gamyate śabdo artha-antara-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2254: viśiṣṭān eva bhāvān āha ity ādinā nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2258: sa eva bhedas tad-vyāvṛttyā gato bhāgas tad-gates tad-upādhitvāt

SA15dhkpvsvu:2279: tena eva aparamārtho asāv anyathā na hi vastunaḥ /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2295: kāryakāraṇabhāva iti rūpaṃ taj-janitaṃ bheda ity aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2298: ca bhedasya tato apy asya bheda iti bheda-upādhitvāt dravya-antara-van
SA15dhkpvsvu:2300: na hi bheda-upādhir eva bhedo ayam ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:2302: tataś ca upādhy-abhāve bhedasya eva abhāvaḥ syāt /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2307: gates tatra śabda-pramāṇa-antarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2309: liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vācyaṃ vastu na kiṃcana //129//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2311: bhaven nānā-phalaḥ śabda eka-ādhāro bhavaty ataḥ //130//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2312: uktaṃ prāg yathā saṃsṛṣṭa-bāhya-adhyātmika-bhedā buddhiḥ svam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2315: tatra eva ca te śabdās tais tair bhrānti-

SA15dhkpvsvu:2317: na ca eka-sādhyaṃ vyavacchedam anyaḥ karoti / saṃketa-

SA15dhkpvsvu:2319: yasya abhidhānād vastu-balena akhile gatiḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2325: viplava-anusārī vyavahāra iti tasya tat-pratibandhe sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2327: tato vitathād apy ante tathābhūta eva vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:2334: yadā anyaṃ tena sa vyāpta ekatvena ca bhāsate //131//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2337: syāt satyaṃ sa hi tatra iti na eka-vastv-abhidhāyini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2341: śabdāś ca buddhayaś ca eva vastuny eṣām asambhavāt //134//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2342: yadi hi vidhi-rūpeṇa vastv eva śabdair vikalpair vā api viṣayīkriyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:2344: ādayaś ca iti manyamānaḥ praṇetā nyāya-śāstrasya anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2348: tad ekam anaṃśaṃ vastu kathaṃ bhinna-ākārābhir buddhibhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2352: tadātmano api sāmānyasya tad-ekayogakṣematvāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2354: ādir na ca vastv-ātmana ekasya tatra eva vṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2357: syāt / sāmānyasya vṛttir na viśeṣasya iti cet /

SA15dhkpvsvu:2362: ayaṃ pravibhāgo yuktaḥ sati vā avyatireko na syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2363: tad ayam avibhāgo anviyād vā na vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2365: ca / yo api bhinnam eva sāmānyam āha / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2367: yathāsvaṃ śabdā bhinnam artham abhidadhānāḥ katham eka-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2371: sarvatra bhāvād vyāvṛtter na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ //136//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2372: yathā hy ekas tasmād bhinnas tathā anyo api iti bhedasya asāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2374: pariśiṣṭa-abhāvas tu prāg eva uktaḥ / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2379: yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2381: artha-abhedena ca vinā śabda-abhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2382: tasmāt tat-kāryatā api iṣṭā atat-kāryād eva bhinnatā //140//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2387: yo api manyate katham abhinnam artham antareṇa bahuṣv ekā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2388: śrutiḥ teṣām asāmyāt eka-vṛtter anyatra pratyaya-ajananāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2389: apratyāsattike ca pratyaya-utpāde atiprasaṅgāt teṣu ca eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2392: iti / tasya apy ekam asti ity eva lokena śabdo niveśanīyaḥ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2393: vā ekam enāṃ śrutiṃ vastu-śaktyā eva dhvanayati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2395: kiṃ tarhi kenacit prayojanena kecic śabdāḥ kvacin niveśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2396: tatra yady anekam ekatra upayujyeta tad avaśyaṃ tatra codanīyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2397: tasya pṛthak pṛthak codane atigauravaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2402: kevalam anena tatra yogyās te arthāś codanīyāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2403: ta ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhir vā iti svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2405: tad iyam ekā śrutir bahuṣu vaktṛ-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2410: yadi hi na prayoktur icchā katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2412: icchāyāṃ vā ka enāṃ bahuṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2421: śabdo bhinneṣu bhaved ity uktaṃ prāk /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2423: tu bhinnānām aviruddhā iti sa eva artha-abhedaḥ śabda-abhedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2427: na punar eṣām anyā tat-kāryatā anyatra anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2430: sambhave kuto rūpa-vijñānam iti vyavahāra-lāghava-arthaṃ kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2431: sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ niveśayet yaro rūpa-vijñāna-hetuḥ śaso
SA15dhkpvsvu:2432: vā iti / api nāma sarveṣāṃ tad-hetūnāṃ sakṛt pratītir yathā syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2433: iti / na ca atra anugāmi kiṃcid rūpam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2435: te bhāvā atad-arthebhyo bhinnā iti bheda eva eṣām abhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2438: kiṃcid ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tatra viśeṣa-abhāvād apārthikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2439: viśeṣa-codanā iti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojana-artham ekam ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2440: lokaḥ śabdaṃ teṣu niyuṅkte ghaṭa iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2449: na punar atra anyat kiṃcid yathā-varṇita-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2453: ye hetu-phala-viśeṣa-bhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:2454: vā te api sakṛt pratyaya-arthaṃ vrīhy-ādi-śabdaiḥ kṛta-saṃketāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2456: ye api pṛthak samastā vā kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2457: upayujyante ta avasthā-viśeṣa-vācibhiḥ sakṛd eva śabdaiḥ pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2458: arthaṃ khyāpyante sanidarśanāḥ sapratighā vā iti tad-anyebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2465: bāhuleyaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtako vā iti / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2466: tat-kārya-pratiṣedhena apy acākṣuṣaḥ śabdo anityo anātma iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2471: ākāraṃ buddhāv āropya tad-vyavacchedena vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2475: eka-vṛtter aneko api yady eka-śrutimān bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2476: na kevalam eka-kāryās tad-anya-bheda-aviśeṣād eka-śabdena ucyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:2477: api tv eka-vṛttyā apy aneka eka-śabdena ucyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2479: uktam atra / tasya upalabhya-abhimatasya anupalabdher abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2481: ādayo na bhaveyur ity ādi / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2482: vṛttir ādheyatā vyaktir iti tasmin na yujyate //143//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2483: yad etad ekam anekatra vartamānam ekāṃ śrutiṃ vartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2496: tasya tatra samavāyād ādhāra iti cet ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:2499: tad eva idam anupakārakasya āśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2502: ādayo api vastu-sambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvān na vyatiricyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2515: svātmany anupakurvāṇo anapekṣasya ādhāra iti yācitaka-maṇḍanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2516: etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ajanakaṃ kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2520: prakṛtyā eva guruṇo dravyasya asamāna-deśa-kārya-utpādana dharmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2523: kṣaṇa-sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ tatra eva badara-kāryaṃ janayad ādhāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2524: ity ucyate / anyathā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi ity api na syāt / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:2528: kiṃ punaḥ sa tayor eva saṃyogaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2530: vā / sa kim ekatra eva na samavaiti janyate vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2532: tad asamarthaṃ pṛthak tat sahitam api tādṛśam eva ity anupakārakatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2542: sambandhā janakasya eva upayoga-viśeṣa-vaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2547: na hy ayaṃ janana-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇa ādhāra-bhāvaḥ sāmānye sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2552: atha api syāt sthāpaka āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya tataḥ sthiti-hetutvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2556: patana-dharmāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ pāta-pratibandhād ajanako api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2558: atra api yadi kaścit pratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2559: sa hi pāta-pratibandho na artha-antaram eva yaḥ sthāpayitrā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2560: kriyeta / artha-antaratve tatra eva asya upayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2561: pratibandhād apāte api tulyaḥ paryanuyogo anavasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2562: vā / tasmāt pāta-abhāvaḥ pāta-pratibandhaḥ sa kathaṃ kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2563: kriyate / abhāvaṃ karoti iti hi na abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2566: nirdeśa eṣa bhāvaṃ na karoti iti yāvat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2568: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya sthāpako nāma / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2569: ayaṃ kenacid apratibaddha iti na kadācit tiṣṭhet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2571: pratibandha ity api kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānām upādāna-samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2574: tat-karaṇād gatimato dravyasya kaścit sthāpako apy astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2575: sāmānyasya akriyasya kiṃ-lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇaḥ sthāpakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2576: syāt / sthitir hi tasya svarūpa-apracyutir eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2583: sā anyā cet tām eva sa āśrayaḥ karoti / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2584: ca apratibaddhā sāmānya iti kim sāmānyasya āśrayeṇa /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2591: jananaṃ cet kim āśrayeṇa apekṣitena anupakāriṇā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2592: apekṣā iti hi tat-pratibandhaḥ sa ca anādheyaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2595: abhede vā sthiteḥ sāmānyāt svarūpam eva tat tasya / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2602: sāmānyasya avyaktasya vyaktyā jñāna-kāraṇatvāt tad-vyaktis tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2606: tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāś ca kāraṇam kārakaṃ matam //146//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2607: prāg eva asya ca yogyatve tad-apekṣā na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2609: na khalu vai kārakād vyañjakasya kaścid bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2612: vā janayan bhāvam eva vyañjaka ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2614: janana-śaktir anākṣiptā janyasya iti janana-mātreṇa kārakatvam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2615: yo hi yato vijñāna-utpādana-yogyatāṃ pratilabhate sa cen
SA15dhkpvsvu:2617: sā asya svabhāva-bhūtā yogyatā prāg eva asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2620: sa eva tato bhavati iti sthiti-vat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2622: taṃ karoti na apy anyam ity akiṃcitkaraś ca apekṣyata iti vyāhatam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2623: etat / nanv ajanakā api kāryatvād dhūma-ādayo vyañjakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2624: satyaṃ vyañjakā na tu dhūmam apekṣya agnir ātmani jñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2625: janayati / tathābhūtasya agneḥ sākṣād ajanakatvāt / kevalam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2626: upādāna-balena eva tatra jñānam utpadyate na viṣaya-balena asaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:2630: balena utpattir vā iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2632: viṣayāḥ sākṣād upayogena vijñānaṃ janayantas tatra param
SA15dhkpvsvu:2633: apekṣante te avaśyaṃ tata ātmānaṃ pratilabhante / na ca ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2640: svāśraya-samavetaṃ hi tad ātmany anyatra vā vijñāna-hetur iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2641: uktam atra ajanya-janakayoḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāva-lakṣaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2644: eva syāt / tad-hetoḥ svabhāvasya prāg-abhāvāt paścāc ca tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2645: bhāvāt / nityaṃ tat-svabhāva-sadbhāve prāg api samavāyād vijñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2650: añjana-āder iva vyakteḥ saṃskāro na indriyasya ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2652: saṃskṛtam añjana-ādibhir indriyaṃ pratipattau kiṃcid atiśayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2655: na evaṃ vyakter indriyasya kaścit saṃskāras tad-bhāva-abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2660: prāg adṛśye darśana-śakty-ādhānād upakāraka iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2662: arthaṃ darśayan kathaṃ na pratipatter bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2666: saṃskārāt tad-darśane tad-vyaṅgyeṣu sāmānyeṣu kadācit aniścayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2669: vyakter yadi indriya-saṃskāro yadi na indriya-saṃskāraḥ sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2670: vijñāna-janana-svabhāva iti svabhāvād apracyuter anapekṣya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2678: yo hy eṣāṃ janaka ātmā sa tadā eva tato bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2679: iti janyatā eva eṣāṃ parasparato apekṣā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2681: paraṃ nityaṃ tat-svabhāvaṃ kim iti indriyam apekṣate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2682: hi tasya kevalasya yo na tat-svabhāvaḥ sa punaḥ kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2685: hetur ity api pāraṃparyeṇa vyakteḥ kāryam eva sāmānyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2687: vyañjakasya ca jātīnāṃ jātimattā yadi iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2689: yo hi yad-viṣaya-vijñāna-hetuḥ sa tasya vyañjakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2695: syuḥ / na hi vyakter api jñāna-hetutāṃ muktvā anyā kācid asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:2700: iti / samavāya-mātraṃ hi vyaktyā saha asya jātaṃ na anyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2702: pūrvavat paścād api na jñāna-hetuḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2703: samavāyād eva jñāna-hetutve svāśraya-samavāyinām anyeṣām api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2705: tasmāj jñāna-hetutā eva vyañjakatvaṃ / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2706: tulyaṃ pradīpa-ādāv iti sa eva prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2709: avṛtter na anekatra jñāna-hetuḥ / ata eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2710: vyakter anyā athavā ananyā yeṣāṃ jātis tu vidyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2720: sā hi buddhir eka-bhāvinī vyakty-antaram evam āskanded bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2721: grāhiṇī yadi tatra dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid anyatra paśyet / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2725: svabhāvo hi svabhāvān na tattvam anyatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2728: eva khalu rūpasya anyatvaṃ yan na tad ākāra-antara-vad aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2729: tac cet sāmānyasya rūpam ananyat tad eva tad bhavati / atattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2736: kvacid anāśrayād anyasya api vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāva-ādeḥ sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2741: darśanena eka-vṛtteḥ pratyayasya anyatra vṛttim icchaṃs tattvānyattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2746: prakṛtiś ca tasya āśraya iti nirloṭhitam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2751: vijñāna-santateḥ sarva-artha-darśaneṣv anapekṣya api tad-bhedaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2755: na hi teṣv atathābhūteṣu kiṃcid vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2761: tena avaśyaṃ hi tatra bhedo nāntarīyakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2762: eṣṭavyaḥ / sa eva sāmānya-kārye paryāpta iti niḥprayojanā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2764: yadi satsv asatsu vā bhāveṣu sāmānya-buddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2765: na iyam arthavatī kevalaṃ viplava eva iti na asmākam asyā viṣaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2766: nirūpaṇaṃ prati kaścid ādaraḥ kvacid avisaṃvādo asyā vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:2768: pratyakṣa-vad atathābhāve api bhāvād iti nivedayiṣyāmo niveditaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2769: ca / bheda-viṣayatvaṃ punar asyā bahulaṃ bhinna-padārtha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2773: api ca ayaṃ sāmānyam artha-antaraṃ kalpayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:2774: svāśraya-mātra-gataṃ vā kalpayet sarva-gataṃ vā ākāśa-ādi-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2777: sambhavaḥ / yasmāt tat pūrva-dravyād utpitsu dravyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2780: na hy anya-dravya-vṛtter bhāvasya tato avicalato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2783: na ca tatra āsīt asti paścān /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2784: na ca tatra utpanno na kutaścid āyāta iti ka imaṃ vyāghāta-bhāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:2785: udvoḍhuṃ samartho anyatra jāḍyāt / api ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2791: bhinna-deśayor hi bhāvayoḥ sambandho dvidhā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2795: na hi sa avayavatvam antareṇa bhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2800: ekasya ādheyasya tatra sthānaṃ tadā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2801: tatra tena eva ātmanā asthānam iti tat-sthita-asthita-ātmanor ekasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2805: syāt / tathā ca gām apy aśva iti pratīyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2814: svasmād acalataḥ sthānād vṛttir ity atiyuktimat //153//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2815: yatra asau vartate bhāvas tena sambadhyate api na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2816: tad-deśinaṃ ca vyāpnoti kim apy etan mahādbhutam //154//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2818: yasya tu sarva-gataṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2819: vyaktā eva ekatra sā vyaktyā abhedāt sarvatragā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2821: na jāter nityāyāḥ kācid vyaktir iti niṣiddham etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2823: anapekṣita-para-upaskārā dṛśyeta vā na vā kadācit tasmin svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2827: api vyaktiṃ vyāpiny ekatra vyaktyā bheda-abhāvād vyaktā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2828: eva sarvatra iti vyakti-śūnyeṣv api pradeśeṣu dṛśyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2834: āśraya-śūnyeṣu pradeśeṣu na dṛśyata iti pratisamādadhīta tasya apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:2835: asty eva āśraya-indriya-saṃyoga upakāraka iti tatas tad-darśī yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2837: na hi tasyāṃ dṛśyamānāyām adṛṣṭaṃ tadīyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2843: hi vyañjakaḥ pradīpa-ādiḥ svarūpa-śūnye deśe sva-vyaṅgyaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2851: api ca anena kim asambhavad abhisamīkṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2854: vyatirekiṇīṣu vyaktiṣv anvayinaḥ pratyayasya ayogāt / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2856: pācaka-ādiṣv abhinnena vinā apy arthena vācakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2859: na hi teṣv anyad ekam abhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2864: kim idānīṃ karmaṇā anyena vā / bhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2865: abhinna-pratyaya-hetur na bhavati ity ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2866: tad yadi bhinnam api karma-abhinnam pratyayaṃ janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2868: ko aparādhaḥ kṛto yena tās tathā na iṣyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2870: asya idam iti vyatireka-pratītir atad-ākāra-viśeṣavatī ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2872: uktam atra yathā vyatireko viśeṣa-pratyayāś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2880: na hy artha-antara-sambandhinī jātir artha-antare pratyaya-hetur
SA15dhkpvsvu:2882: pācaka-karmasu ca karma-jātir na ca tāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:2888: ca pākaḥ pāka iti hi tataḥ syān na punaḥ pācaka iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2892: na hy anityaṃ karma sarvadā asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2894: niruddhe karmaṇi na pācaka ity ucyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2897: asambandhān na sāmānyaṃ na ayuktam śabda-kāraṇam //158//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2899: vinaṣṭe hi karmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmaṇi na kartari iti sambaddha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2900: sambandhe apy asya na asti ity asambandhān na śabda-jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2907: asad hi nirupākhyaṃ kathaṃ nimittaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2912: anyac ca vyakty-ādikaṃ na iṣṭam ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2914: tathā ca na jāti-siddhis tasyā jñāna-abhidhānayoḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2917: na karma na sāmānyam iti cet
SA15dhkpvsvu:2919: na hi śaktir nāma kiṃcid anyad eva pācaka-ādīnām / tasyā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2921: tasya upayoga iti cet kim idānīṃ śaktyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2926: eva upayujyata iti kiṃ na iṣyata iti kim antarāle anarthikayā śaktyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2927: tasmāc śaktir iti dravyam eva tat-kāryaṃ tac ca na anveti iti / tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2929: sāmānyaṃ pācakatva-ādi yadi prāg eva tad bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2930: vyaktaṃ sattā-ādi-van no cen na paścād aviśeṣataḥ //160//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2931: atha api pācakatvam iti sāmānyam eva kiṃcid bhavet / saty arthe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2934: syāt / yāvanti hi sāmānyāny arthe samavāya-dharmāṇi tāni saha
SA15dhkpvsvu:2937: paścād apy aviśeṣān na tat-samavāyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2939: vaiguṇyād hi sa tasya prāṅ na āsīt tatra eva ca asya svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2940: sthitasya paścād bhavati iti duranvayam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2942: na apekṣa-atiśaye apy asya kṣaṇikatvāt kriyā kutaḥ //161//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2943: karma-upakāram apekṣya pācakatvaṃ dravyeṇa vyajyata iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2944: sthira-svabhāvasya anatiśayād aviśeṣa-ādhāyini kā apekṣā / atiśaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:2945: vā kṣaṇikatvāt karmaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāva-bhūtasya anyānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2946: atiśayasya utpattes tad api kṣaṇikaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2948: kriyā kutaḥ yad-apekṣaṃ vyañjakaṃ syāt / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2949: tarhi idānīm asty abhinne vastuni jñāna-śabdayor anvayinor vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2951: nanu tad eva idaṃ cintyate kathaṃ teṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2952: api iti / cintitam etad yathā na teṣu sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2960: na punar vikalpa-abhidhānayor vastu-sattā samāśraya ity ukta-prāyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2962: aparāpara-darśane apy anvayinos tayor darśanāt / na ca tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2963: tan-nibandhanaḥ kaścit svabhāvo asti paraspara-virodhinor yugapad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2967: bhavat kvacid bhavati kvacin na bhavati iti niyamam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2968: arhati / na khalu vai tad animittaṃ vāsanā-viśeṣa-nimittatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2969: bāhyaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ dṛśyaṃ na asti iti brūmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2974: ca te asatsu utpadyanta iti sarvatra sarva-ākāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2977: uktaṃ ca atra kiṃcid asmābhiḥ prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2978: api kecid eka-jñāna-kāryāḥ svabhāva-bhedād iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2979: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2980: kvacin na anyatra sa eva astu śabda-jñāna-nibandhanam //162//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2982: na nivṛttiṃ vihāya asti yadi bhāva-anvayo aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2983: ekasya kāryam anyasya na syād atyanta-bhedataḥ //163//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2984: yady ete bhāvā vyāvṛttiṃ muktvā svabhāvena kenacid anvayinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2985: śūnyāḥ / na eṣāṃ bahūnām ekaṃ kāryaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2987: janakaḥ / na hi so anyasya asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2988: yo asti sa na janako vyatirekas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2991: ca aparatra na asti iti na aparaṃ janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2992: sa hi tasya svabhāvo yo janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2996: yady ekātmatayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2997: ātmā ekatra api so asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ //164//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2998: yady eka-svabhāvatvād aneka ekasya kārakaḥ sa teṣām abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3002: na apaity abhinnaṃ tad-rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalv apāyinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3003: na hi tasya abhinna-svabhāvasya artha-antare viśeṣo asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3005: hāneḥ / sa ca tatra apy asti iti na eka-sthitāv api tasya apāyo asti / ye
SA15dhkpvsvu:3006: viśeṣās teṣāṃ saha-sthiti-niyama-abhāvāt syād apāyaḥ / na ca te
SA15dhkpvsvu:3014: tat-kāryam aneka-sahakāri-sādhāraṇam eka-viśeṣa-apāye api na bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3015: punar apy avikaleṣu sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3018: kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāva-dharmi yan na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:3022: avikale api tasminn abhavat tasya ajanaka-ātmatāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3025: tasmin sati niyamena bhavatas tad-anyasmād utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3028: sāmānyaṃ / tatas ta eva vastu / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3029: sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya eva arthakriyā-kṣamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3030: idam eva hi vastv-avastunor lakṣaṇaṃ yad arthakriyā-yogyatā ayogyatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3034: na anveti yo anveti na tasmāt kārya-sambhavaḥ //166//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3035: tasmāt sarvaṃ sāmānyam anarthakriyā-yogyatvād avastu / vastu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3036: tu viśeṣa eva tata eva tan-niṣpatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3038: ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya na asti ity ajanakaḥ syāt / janakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3041: tena ātmanā hi bhede api hetuḥ kaścin na ca aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3043: ekasya janakād ātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3044: aviśeṣe kaścid iti syād etad yady eṣāṃ na viśeṣaḥ sambhavet / tato bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3045: api kutaścid ātma-atiśayāt kaścij janako na aparaḥ / sa hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3048: arhanti kim agnir dahaty uṣṇo vā na udakam iti / etāvat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3052: tasmāt svabhāvo asya sva-hetor ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3053: tasya api taj-janana-ātmatā tad-anyasmād ity anādir hetu-paraṃparā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3054: bhinnānāṃ hi kaścid hetur na anyaḥ svabhāvād ity atra na kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3057: abhedāt / svabhāvena eva viśvasya svātma-vad vibhāga-utpatti-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3058: nirodha-ādayo na syuḥ tathā upalakṣaṇād abhedasya / idam eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3059: bheda-abheda-lakṣaṇam eka-ākārasya api vyatireko avyatirekaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3061: bhedo api tena na evaṃ ced /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3062: na vai sarva-ākāra-avyatirekaṃ brūmo yena evaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3064: bhinno na anya iti bhedān na sahotpatty-ādayaḥ / evaṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3067: bhedaḥ / sthāna-asthānayor ekātma-āśrayatve ko anyo dharmo bhedaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:3068: iti nānātvam eva kvacin na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3070: abhyupagamān nāma kevalaṃ na iṣṭaṃ syān na vastv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3071: ity uktam / tad ime na ekayogakṣemā bhāvāḥ bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3073: tad idam artha-antaram anāyattam ajanyatvād asya idaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3074: bhedo vā iti vyapadeśaṃ na arhati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3078: na hy anyāpoho nāma kiṃcit tasya ca svabhāva-anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3080: upaplavaś ca sāmānya-dhiyas tena apy adūṣaṇā //169//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3081: nirviṣayam eva khalv idaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ yad anekatra eka-ākāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:3082: iti na tad-viṣayasya abhāvāt sthitir asthitir vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3085: yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato anyo janakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3086: tatra na brūmo anyasya taj-janakaṃ rūpaṃ na asti iti / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3087: yad ekasya taj-janakaṃ tad anyasya na ity anyo api svarūpeṇa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3090: ca svabhāvena iti ko atra virodhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3093: tena eva ca tat-kāryaṃ kartavyam iti ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:3096: ity uktam / na ca te viśeṣās tena ātmanā parasparam anuyanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3097: yad ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya tan na asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3101: syād etat satyaṃ viśeṣā janakāḥ na punas teṣāṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3102: rūpaṃ kiṃ tv abhinnam api tad-eka-śakti-yogāj janakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3104: saty api sāmānye rūpe na tena te janakās tasya anapāyād eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3105: api kārya-utpatti-prasaṅgād ity uktaṃ prāk / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3110: sarva-arthān manyate tasya ayam artheṣu buddhi-pratibhāsa-bhedo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3114: tathā ca ayaṃ pravibhāgo na syād ekātma-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3119: sa eva arthas tasya vyāvṛttayo apare //170//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3120: tat-kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca uktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3122: yad arthakriyākāri tad eva vastv ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3124: yat punar etat sāmānyaṃ nāma tat tasya eva aparasmād bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3125: na hi tasya arthatve dṛśyasya rūpa-anupalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam / tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3127: yathā abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3128: tathā bheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam //173//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3129: yad uktam / kathaṃ taj-janaka-svabhāvād bhinno asya janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3130: syāt / janakatve vā aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syād iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3131: atra / yady aviśeṣaḥ syāt syād etad iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3133: abheda-vādino abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaḥ sarvasya janaka iti tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3135: bhede hi kārakaṃ kiṃcid vastu-dharmatayā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3136: abhede tu virudhyete tasya ekasya kriyā-akriye //174//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3138: eva kārakāḥ syuḥ na anye atat-svabhāvatvād ity atra na eva kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3140: ekatve tu tasya tatra eva tathā kārakatvam akārakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3142: bhedo apy asty akriyātaś cen na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3143: na vai sarva-ākāra-avivekaṃ brūmo bhedasya api bhāvāt / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3147: paryāyeṇa atha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasya eva vastunaḥ //175//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3148: atha api syān na eva kaścid akārako asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3150: upayogāt / śakter vā vipariṇatāyās tan-niveśinyā rūpa-antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3151: upayogāt / sa eva khalv ayaṃ paryāyo bheda-āśraya ekasya katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3154: hānir iti yat kiṃcid etat / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3157: bhāvāś ced abhinnena ātmanā svātmabhūtena bhedinas tadvantaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3158: syuḥ tad-abhinna-svabhāva-ātmatvād bhedasya api kutaḥ parasparaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3159: bhedaḥ / atha na sa tasya samāna ātmā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3161: tena api na yuktaṃ tathā bhavitum /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3164: na hy ayaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān svabhāva eko yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3167: na hi kvacid asya ekāntiko bhedo abhedo vā vivekena vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3170: bhedaḥ sāmānyam ity etad yadi bhedas tadātmanā //177//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3172: yadi sāmānya-viśeṣayor yam ātmānam āśritya sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3173: iti sthitis tena ātmanā bhedas tadā bheda eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3175: tayoḥ svātmānau tau ced vyatirekiṇau vyatireka eva sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3180: vyatireke ca bheda-sāmānyayor na bhedaḥ sāmānyān na sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3183: yam ātmānaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo ayaṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3185: cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3186: asty eva vastu na anveti pravṛtty-ādi-prasaṅgataḥ //180 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3187: sarva eva gaur aśvād bhinno abhinno vā iti bhedam abhedaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3188: pṛcchan viśeṣam eva bhāvasya svabhāva-ākhyam adhikṛtya pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3196: pratyupasthāpitam arthaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā pṛcchann
SA15dhkpvsvu:3197: artha-antara-upakṣepeṇa tatra kim iti dvi-mukha-buddhiḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3198: tasmād yo asya ātmā ananya-sādhāraṇo yaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3199: viśiṣṭa-arthakriyā-arthī pravartate yathā gor vāha-doha-ādau na anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3200: sambhavino arthasya yathā yuddha-praveśe sa eva svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3211: sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇasya svabhāva-bhūtasya ca sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3214: arthakriyā-arthī samaṃ dvayor api pravarteta / eko api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3217: tat tulyam iti so api kiṃ na karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3218: etena eva yad ahrīkāḥ kiṃ apy aślīlam ākulam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3220: yad ayam ahrīkaḥ syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti kim apy aślīlam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3221: ayuktam aheya-upādeyam apariniṣṭhānād ākulaṃ pralapanti / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3225: codito dadhi khādeti kim uṣṭraṃ na abhidhāvati //182//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3226: tathā hy uṣṭro api syād dadhi na api sa eva uṣṭraḥ ye na anyo api syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3227: uṣṭraḥ / tathā dadhy api syād uṣṭraḥ na api tad eva dadhi yena anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3229: tad anayor ekasya api kasyacit tad-rūpa-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3230: abhāvāt svarūpasya vā atad-bhāvinaḥ sva-niyatasya abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3232: dadhi khādeti codita uṣṭram api khādet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3233: atha asty atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena vartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3234: sa eva dadhi so anyatra na asti ity anubhayaṃ param //183//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3235: atha anayoḥ kaścid atiśayo asti yena ayaṃ tathā coditaḥ kṣīra-vikāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3240: sa ca tādṛśaḥ svabhāvo anyatra na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3242: arthinaḥ / tasmāt tan na ubhaya-rūpam ity ekānta-vādaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3244: sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhī-dhvanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3246: so ayam ahrīkaḥ kvacid apy ekam ākāraṃ pratiniyatam apaśyan
SA15dhkpvsvu:3250: vādo na syāt syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3254: kvacit pratiniyamāt tat-pratibhāsa-bheda-kṛta eva tayo rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3257: tathā ca na ekas tad-ubhaya-rūpaḥ syād iti mithyā-vāda
SA15dhkpvsvu:3258: eṣaḥ / sthitam etat na bhāvānāṃ kaścit svabhāva-anvayo asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3264: yeṣāṃ tu nirupākhyānāṃ svabhāva eva na asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3269: ayogāt / tathā ca sarvatra ayam anvaya-vyatireka-āśrayo vyavahāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:3270: na syāt uṣṇa-svabhāvo agnir na anuṣṇa ity api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3274: agni-svabhāvasya apratipattir iti vyāmūḍhaṃ jagat syāt / syād etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3275: na tatra kasyacid asato niṣedhaḥ anuṣṇaṃ sad eva artha-antaraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3279: asat tatra na asti iti deśa-kāla-dharma-niṣedha eva sarva-bhāveṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3284: yasmān na tatra api deśa-ādīnāṃ pratiṣedho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3288: api tulyo doṣo niṣedhād asati śabda-apravṛttir ity ādi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3294: na iha ghaṭo na idānīṃ na evam ity uktau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3295: na anena sambandho asti na etad dharmā vā iti pratītiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3298: asya sambandho dharmo vā na asti iti matir na bhavati / na ca asyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3299: kathaṃcid bhāve sambhavo abhāveṣu tathā abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3301: abhāva-pratīter na ayam iha ity ādyā pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3306: sa eva hi śabdānāṃ na viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3308: te cet pravṛttāḥ ko vacanasya niṣeddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3309: na hy avācyam arthaṃ buddhayaḥ samīhante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3316: api sambandhi-rūpa eva iti svarūpeṇa na abhidhīyate / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3317: na abhāva-vat sambandhe api prasaṅgaḥ / api ca / ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3318: abhāvam abhidheyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ prati pratividadhad abruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3320: vacane vā asya katham abhāvo anuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3326: nirviṣayasya naño aprayoga ity atra uttaraṃ vakṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3331: na āśaṅkyā eva siddhās te vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ //185//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3332: vastu-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānāṃ kiṃ rūpam abhidheyam āhosvid bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:3337: bhāvasya / tasmād ayam eva sa mukhyo vivekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3338: tasya tathā abhāva-khyāpinaḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ viveka-viṣayā ity asthānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3340: tasmāt siddham etat sarve śabdā viveka-viṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3343: avadhi-bheda-upakalpitair bhedair bhinneṣv iva pratibhātsu buddhau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3348: hetur iti / sa ca ayaṃ hetutvena apadiśyamānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3352: tena iyaṃ kṛtaka-śrutiḥ svabhāva-abhidhāyiny api para-upādhim enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3354: upādhi-bheda-apekṣaḥ kvacit svabhāvo hetur ucyate kvacid anapekṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3355: sāmānyena yathā anityatva eva sattvam kvacit svabhāva-bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3356: dharma-viśeṣa-parigraheṇa yathā tatra eva utpattiḥ / anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3358: sattā-svabhāvo hetuś cen na sattā sādhyate katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3360: yadi sattvam anityatve anyatra vā hetuḥ syāt sādhyam api kasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3361: na iṣyate / tat kila evaṃ prasādhyamānaṃ viśeṣībhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3362: na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhāyituṃ śakyate ananvayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3365: so ayaṃ viśeṣo na sādhya eva vyāhanyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3371: na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syād aniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam //188//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3372: na sarvathā sattā-sādhane viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3374: viśeṣaṇo asti kaścid dharmī iti prasādhayato anirdiṣṭa-svabhāva-viśeṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3375: kasyacit sattā-mātre virodha-abhāvāt na iha sattā-sādhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3376: pratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu sa tathā asti kaścid iti kaṃcana asya bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3380: upātta-bhede sādhye asmin bhavad hetur ananvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3381: sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet //189//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3382: sa hi dharmī pradhāna-lakṣaṇa eko nityaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmako anyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3383: vā iti yathākathaṃcid api viśeṣitas tat-svabhāvaḥ prasādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3385: yad api sattā-mātram anveti na tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3387: nanv evam agny-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3391: na vai sa ādhāras taṃ viśeṣīkaroti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3392: tad-ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3394: na tathā iha api kvacit sattāyāḥ sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3396: eva arthasya kvacid abhāvān nirviśeṣaṇā eva sā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3401: tathā api kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt / anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3402: tu tad eva agni-sāmānyaṃ tatra asiddham iti sādhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3404: tad-ayoga-virahiṇā sāmānyena anvayo na siddha eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3408: agni-nāntarīyako darśanīyo yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3410: mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatra eva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatra eva agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3412: tatra ca sādhya-nirdeśena na kiṃcit / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3417: siddhaḥ / arthād eva agnes tat-pradeśa-ayogaṃ vyavacchinatti iti sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3419: na punas tathā asya upanyāsa-pūrvako anvayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3424: liṅgasya avyabhicāras tu dharmeṇa anyatra darśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3426: tasmān na agny-ādi-sādhana-vat sattā-sādhanam apy anavadyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3437: dharmo viruddho abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham //191//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3443: sa katham asiddha-sattāke syāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3445: sa kathaṃ bhāvaṃ na icchet / svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3446: eva hi kayācid apekṣayā dharma iti vyatirekī iva dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3448: na hi dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3451: anāśrita-vastuno aparyudāsena vyatireka-mātrasya abhāve apy avirodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3452: yathā na bhavati mūrta iti amūrtatvaṃ nirupākhye api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3453: syāt / nirupākhyasya abhāvād na pratiṣedha-viṣayatā iti cet / tat kim
SA15dhkpvsvu:3459: etad vyavaccheda-mātraṃ dvayor api sambhavad vipakṣa-pracāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3461: kuryāt / sa ca svayaṃ sva-vāca-ubhaya-dharmatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3462: anyatra apy asya vṛttiṃ bhāṣate sattāyāṃ ca avyabhicāram iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3465: arthasya vyavacchedaṃ hetuṃ sattāyāṃ vadato asya viruddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3466: hetuḥ syāt / tasya bhāve kvacid asambhavāt abhāve ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3468: tad ayaṃ triprakāro api dharmaḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3469: sādhane na hetu-lakṣaṇa-bhāk na ca anyā gatir asti / tasmān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3472: vastu-dharme siddha-sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ / tena ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3473: sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptir yadi kathaṃcin niścīyate na virodha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3476: samāśraye vā tat-svabhāvatayā gamako na kaścid gamakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3479: vācyaḥ / na hi prakāśatayā prakāśayan pradīpas tad-rūpa-apratipattau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3483: tad-dharma-niścayād eva niścito vyāpakatvena tasya dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3486: tasya vyāpyasya dharmasya ayaṃ nivartako vyāpako dharmaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3488: evaṃ hy ayam asya vyāpakaḥ siddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3489: bhavati yady asya abhāve na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3492: hi prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca / yathā āhur
SA15dhkpvsvu:3494: na anayor vastutaḥ kaścid bhedo anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3496: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3497: gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvaya-abhāvāt / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3498: vaidharmye apy anvaya-gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya-abhāve hetv-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3500: anityatve yathā kāryam akāryaṃ vā avināśini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3503: tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ śabdaś ca kṛtaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:3504: iti kṛtakatvasya apy anityatvena vyāptiṃ pradarśya śabdas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3505: kṛtakatve kathite sāmarthyād eva anityaḥ śabda iti / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3508: vyatireke api na anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ bhavati śabdaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3509: kṛtaka iti / siddha-tat-svabhāvatayā tad-abhāve na bhavataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3510: kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva-khyātau tadātmanaḥ sato bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3511: sāmarthyāt siddheḥ pūrvavān na pratijñā-vacanam / anvayas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3514: nivṛttiḥ / tasmāt tan-niyamaṃ prasādhya nivṛttir vaktavyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3515: sā cet sidhyati tadātma-niyamam arthāt sūcayati iti siddho anvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3516: katham idānīṃ kṛtako avaśyam anitya iti pratyetavyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3519: na hi bhāvā vinaśyantas tad-bhāve hetum apekṣante / sva-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3521: tasmād yaḥ kaścit kṛtakaḥ sa prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3523: sāpekṣāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ na avaśyaṃbhāvitā īkṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3527: bāhulye api hi tad-hetor bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ //194//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3528: yady api bahulaṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva-pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3529: adhīna-saṃnidhitvān na avaśyaṃ saṃnidhānam iti kaścin na vinaśyed
SA15dhkpvsvu:3530: api / na hy avaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanto vaikalya-pratibandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3535: tad ayaṃ bhāvo anapekṣas tad-bhāvaṃ prati
SA15dhkpvsvu:3538: nanv anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcit kvacin na avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3542: apekṣā / tatra apy antyā kāraṇa-sāmagrī yā avyavahitā kārya-utpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3547: na ca tāṃ tatra kaścit pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3550: tadātmanaś ca apracyutasya tad-utpādanaṃ prati vaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3552: yava-bīja-ādayo api śāly-aṅkure janye na sāpekṣāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3556: yāvatā sa eva eṣāṃ svabhāvo na asti yas tad-utpādanaḥ śāli-bījasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3559: satāṃ vā sa eva svabhāvo na asti yo vinaśvaraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3563: sva-hetor iti yo na tad-hetuḥ so atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3565: ca sa hetuḥ svarūpeṇa pratīta eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3569: ayogāt tathā atra api niyama-hetur vaktavyo yata ime kecin
SA15dhkpvsvu:3570: naśvara-ātmano jātā na ca atra kaścin niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3572: janmi-svabhāvo nāśī iti cet / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:3573: janma nāśi-svabhāvasya hetuḥ na ca ahetoḥ svabhāva-niyamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3574: tasmān na atra kaścid hetoḥ svabhāva-pravibhāgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3576: phalasya api na asti ity asamānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3578: kvacit kadācic ca bhāva-virodhinī tad-abhāvaṃ svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3579: sādhayati / yo hi svabhāvo nirapekṣaḥ sa yadi kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3580: bhavet kvacid vā tat-kāla-dravya-apekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3582: sa tarhi naśvaraḥ svabhāvo nirapekṣa iti ahetukaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3583: syāt / na ahetukaḥ sattā-hetor eva bhāvāt tathā-utpatteḥ / sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3590: tad hi kiṃcid upalīyeta na vā yasya yatra kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3594: tasmān na iyam ākasmikī kvacit / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3597: uktaṃ ca atra na vināśo nāma anya eva kaścid bhāvāt svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3598: eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hy eka-kṣaṇa-sthāyī jāta iti / tam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3599: mandāḥ svabhāvam ūrdhvaṃ vyavasyanti na prāk darśane api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3600: pāṭava-abhāvād iti tad-vaśena paścād vyavasthāpyate vikāra-darśanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3602: tad ayaṃ sattā-vyatirekeṇa na anyat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3609: siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3613: iti / kathaṃ kriyā-pratiṣedho vināśa iti hi te bhāva-abhāvaṃ manyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3614: tad ayaṃ vināśa-hetur abhāvaṃ karoti iti prāptam / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3615: yady abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3617: tasmād abhāvaṃ karoti iti bhāvaṃ na karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3620: kim iti apekṣyata iti siddhā vināśaṃ praty anapekṣayā bhāvasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3623: yatra nāma bhavaty asmād anyatra api svabhāvataḥ //196//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3624: so ayaṃ kvacid bhavan dṛṣṭo anapekṣatvāt svabhāvata eva bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3625: tathā anyatra api svabhāva-bhāvī viśeṣa-abhāvād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3626: yā kācid bhāva-viṣayā dvidhā eva anumitis tataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3628: tasmāt dviprakārā eva vastu-viṣaya-anumitiḥ kārya-liṅgā svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3629: liṅgā ca / yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhye tayor eva pratibandhāt liṅgayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3633: tṛtīyas tu hetur anupalabdhir aviśeṣeṇa kvacid arthe gamaka ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3634: ucyate / san-niścaya-śabda-vyavahāra-pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3639: tac ca pratipattṛ-vaśān na vastu-vaśāt / tāvad hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3640: sa bhāvo asya na asti yāvad atra apratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3642: vastutas tv anupalabhyamāno na san na asan / satām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3643: api svabhāva-ādi-viprakarṣāt kadācid anupalambhāt tasya asatsv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3644: tulyatvāt / tad etat pratipattuḥ pramāṇa-abhāvān nivṛttaṃ sattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3646: tena yā api iyam anupalabdhir upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3653: na hy asti sambhavo yad upalabdhi-yogyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3654: sakaleṣv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san na upalabhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3658: aliṅgāś ca kathaṃ teṣām abhāvo anupalabdhitaḥ //199//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3659: so ayam asattāṃ sādhayann anupalabdhi-mātreṇa sarva-arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3670: kāla-vyavahitā vā prakaraṇa-anupayogino dravya-viśeṣā na tān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3680: sad-asan-niścaya-phalā na iti syād vā apramāṇatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3681: na eva vā iyam anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇaṃ vyavasāya-phalatvāt pramāṇānām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3682: na hi pravṛtti-niṣedhe api iyaṃ niḥśaṅka-paricchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3684: saṃśayād api kvacil lokasya pravṛtteḥ / tathātve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3685: tan niravadyaṃ yadi niścaya-pūrvaṃ vyavahared iti sā iyam apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3691: yat punar uktam apramāṇam anupalabdhir iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3693: yasya kasyacit svabhāvo na upalabhyate deśa-ādi-viprakarṣāt na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3694: sa tad-anupalambha-mātreṇa asan nāma yathoktaṃ prāk / yo api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3695: jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvād atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3696: viśeṣo vā yathā na asti viraktaṃ ceto devatā-viśeṣo vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3697: na asti dāna-hiṃsā-virati-cetanānām abhyudaya-hetutā iti pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:3698: apy arthe phalasya ānantarya-abhāvād atat-phala-sādharmyād viparyasto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3699: apavadeta api na tāvatā tad-abhāva eva vyavahitānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3710: kārye tu kāraka-ajñānam abhāvasya eva sādhakam //201//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3711: svabhāva-abhāve sādhye tad-anupalambha eva apramāṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3716: dṛṣṭā / na brūmaḥ kāraṇa-sthiti-kāla-bhāvī kāryam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3718: tu bhāva-utpattir na asti ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3719: na ca tathā sthāyī bhāvas tad-upādānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3721: yady asya kathaṃcid abhāvaḥ sidhyet tat-phalaṃ na asti iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3723: svabhāva-abhāva eva liṅgini svabhāva-anupalambho api kaścit pramāṇam eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3724: eva yady anupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvo asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3728: yady asya kāraṇasya svabhāvasya vyāpakasya vā abhāvaḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3733: katham idānīṃ bhāvasya svayam anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3737: bhāvo hi yadi bhaved yathāsvaṃ grāhakeṇa karaṇena upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3738: eva bhavet / sa darśana-pratibandhiṣu vyavadhāna-ādiṣv asatsu upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3739: eva / anupalabdhas tv asann iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3746: yo hi bhāvo yena saha na avatiṣṭhate tad-upādānayor anyonya-vaiguṇya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3747: āśrayatvena ārambha-virodhāt tayor viruddhayor ekasya bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3751: tata eva virodha-gater virodhāc ca abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3752: sādhanāt / bhavatu nāma evaṃvidhāyā anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3756: na hy asyāṃ kaścid dṛṣṭānto asti / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3761: katham adṛṣṭāntikā asattā-siddhiḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vā anavasthā-prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3770: etān sādhayati iti sva-nimitta-sāmagrī-yogya-saṃnidhānaḥ sarvo atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3771: dṛṣṭāntaḥ / asattā punar atra anupalabdhir eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3776: nimitta-vaikalya-abhāvino aṅkura-ādayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevalaṃ nirupākhyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3777: nirupākhye api iyam eva pravṛttir niṣidhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3781: vā abhyupagamya pravṛtti-nivṛttī vilomayan yathā abhyupagamaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3786: anyatra apy anumāne sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptaṃ sādhanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3787: icchan kim iti dṛṣṭāntena pratyāyyo vyāpya-nirdeśād eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3792: asad-vyavahāraṃ pratipadyamāno api iha vyāmūḍha iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3793: smāryate / atha yad idaṃ na santi pradhāna-ādayo anupalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:3797: abhidhānasya nirviṣayasya ca pratiṣedhasya ayogāt / na eṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3802: tathā hetur na tasya eva abhāvaḥ śabda-prayogataḥ //206//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3803: niveditam etat yathā na ete śabdāḥ svalakṣaṇa-viṣayā anādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3805: kurvanti vaktuḥ śrotus ca tad-vikalpa-bhājo yathāpratibhāsi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3807: na ca upādāna-kārya-pratyaya-apratibhāsi rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tad-viṣayatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3816: sādhye sa eva pratyātma-vedyatvād apratikṣepa-arho artho dharmī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3817: na ca sa eva arthaḥ svalakṣaṇam iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3824: atīta-ajātayor vā api na ca syād anṛta-arthatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3825: vācaḥ kasyāścid ity eṣā bauddha-artha-viṣayā matā //208//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3828: sādhye tathā anupalambho asya dharmo asti iti na sādhana-dharma-asiddhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3829: na punar atra ayam eva śabda-vikalpa-pratibhāsy artho apahnūyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3833: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddho dharmaś ca kevalaḥ //209//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3834: yadi hi śabda-artha eva apohyeta pradhāna-śabda-vācyasya dharmiṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3835: eva nirākaraṇān nirādhāraḥ sādhya-dharmaḥ syāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3836: ādhāra-vyavaccheda-anapekṣo na vivāda-āśraya iti na upanyasanīya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3839: vastv eva cintyate hy atra pratibaddhaḥ phala-udayaḥ //210//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3842: na hi śabda-artho asan san vā kaṃcit puruṣa-artham uparuṇaddhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3847: avadhīrita-vikalpa-pratibhāso vastv eva adhiṣṭhānīkaroti yatra ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3848: puruṣa-arthaḥ pratibaddho yathā agnau śīta-pratīkāra-ādiḥ / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:3849: atra śabda-arthaḥ samarthas tad-anubhava-āptāv api tad-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3850: tad ayam arthakriyā-arthī tad-asamarthaṃ prati dattā-anuyogo bhavituṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3851: na yuktaḥ / na hi vṛṣasyantī ṣaṇḍhasya rūpa-vairūpya-parīkṣāyām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3852: avadhatte / yat punar etad uktaṃ kalpitasya anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3865: tan-nivṛttiḥ kathaṃ na gamikā iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3866: atra na āgameṣu sarva-arthā upanibadhyante aprakaraṇa-āpannatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3869: na artha-siddhis tatas te hi vaktṛ-abhiprāya-sūcakāḥ //213//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3870: na hi śabdā yathābhāvaṃ vartante yatas tebhyo artha-prakṛtir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3871: niścīyeta / te hi vaktur vivakṣā-vṛttaya iti tan-nāntarīyakās
SA15dhkpvsvu:3874: na ca tad-apratibaddha-svabhāvo bhāvo anyaṃ gamayati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3875: yat tarhi idam āpta-vāda-avisaṃvāda-sāmānyād anumānatā ity āgamasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3882: tat sati pravartitavye varam evaṃ pravṛtta
SA15dhkpvsvu:3883: iti parīkṣayā prāmāṇyam āha / tac ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3891: aśakya-upāya-phalāni ca śāstrāṇi phala-arthī na ādriyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:3897: śāstraṃ parīkṣyeta anyatra avadhānasya eva ayuktatvāt / tad yadi na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3898: parīkṣāyāṃ visaṃvāda-bhāk pravartamānaḥ śobheta / kaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:3911: rūpaṃ tat-prabhavaṃ ca adharmam abhyupagamya tat-prahāṇāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3916: buddher agatyā abhihitā parokṣe apy asya gocare //216//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3917: tasya ca asya evaṃbhūtasya āpta-bhūtasya avisaṃvāda-sāmānyād adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3920: tataḥ śabda-prabhavā api satī na śābda-vad abhiprāyaṃ nivedayaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:3927: yathā catūrṇām āryasatyānāṃ vakṣyamāṇanītyā / tasya asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3929: api tathātva-upagamo na vipralambhāya anuparodhāt niṣprayojana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3936: anāntarīyakatvād artheṣu śabdānām iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3940: iṣṭo ayam arthaḥ śakyeta jñātuṃ so atiśayo yadi //218//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3941: sarve eva āgamam anāgamaṃ vā pravṛtti-kāmo anveṣate prekṣā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3943: api nāma anuṣṭheyam ato jñātvā pravṛtto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3953: ayam evaṃ na vā ity anya-doṣa-anirdoṣatā api vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3954: durlabhatvāt pramāṇānāṃ durbodhā ity apare viduḥ //219//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3957: syuḥ / vyavahārāś ca prāyaśo buddhi-pūrvam anyathā api kartuṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3959: tad ayaṃ liṅga-saṃkarāt katham aniścinvan pratipadyeta / atha
SA15dhkpvsvu:3960: kiṃ na eva sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣo asti yo nirdoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3962: sa ātmībhāvāt tad-abhyāsād dhīyeran āśravāḥ kvacit //220 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:3966: vikalpa-prabhavāḥ saty apy upādāne kasyacin mano-guṇasya abhyāsād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3972: nāma / yāvatā doṣa-vipakṣa-sātmatve api doṣa-sātmano vipakṣa-utpatti-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3976: na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat-pakṣa-pātataḥ //221 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3977: na hi svabhāvo ayatnena vinivartayituṃ śakyaḥ / śrotriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3994: pātena pratipakṣa eva yatna-ādhānāt parīkṣāvato viśeṣeṇa aduṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3995: ātmanaḥ / kaḥ punar eṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ prabhavo yat-pratipakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3998: sā avidyā tatra tat-snehas tasmād dveṣa-ādi-sambhavaḥ //222 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:3999: na hi na ahaṃ na mama iti paśyataṃ parigraham antareṇa kvacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:4000: snehaḥ / na ca ananurāgiṇaḥ kvacid dveṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4006: sa ca dveṣa-ādīni iti satkāyadarśanajāḥ sarva-doṣāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4009: moho nidānaṃ doṣāṇām ata eva abhidhīyate//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4011: mohaṃ doṣa-nidānam āhuḥ amūḍhasya doṣa-anutpatteḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:4013: tac ca etat pradhāna-nirdeśe sati syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4023: prahāṇam / sa tu kṣīṇa-doṣo duranvayo yad-upadeśād ayaṃ pratipadyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4024: mā bhūt puruṣa-āśrayaṃ vacanam āgamaḥ praṇetur
SA15dhkpvsvu:4028: na khalu sarva eva āgamaḥ sambhāvya-vipralambhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4030: hetūnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ puruṣa-āśrayād apauruṣeyaṃ satya-artham ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:4031: eke / kāraṇa-abhāvo hi kārya-abhāvaṃ sādhayati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4035: apauruṣeyaṃ mithyā-arthaṃ kiṃ na ity anye pracakṣate //225 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:4036: yathā rāga-ādi-parītaḥ puruṣo mṛṣā-vādī dṛṣṭas tathā dayā-dharmatā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4050: tat-saṃskāryatā eva ca eṣāṃ pauruṣeyatā yuktā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4062: kiṃ hy asya apauruṣeyatayā yato hi samayād artha-pratipattiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4079: na vai sambandho vidyamāno apy anabhivyaktaḥ pratīti-hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4083: nanv iyān sambandhasya vyāpāro yad artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4090: samarthaṃ hi rūpaṃ śabdasya yogyatā kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4092: sā ced artha-antaraṃ kiṃ śabdasya iti sambandho
SA15dhkpvsvu:4105: apreritā vāg ata idam iti viduṣaḥ sva-nidāna-ābhāsinam arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4106: sūcayati iti buddhi-rūpa-vāg vijñaptyor janyajanakabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4111: astu vā anya eva nityaḥ sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4113: girām eka-artha-niyame na syād artha-antare gatiḥ//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4114: na hi tena sambandhena asambaddhe arthe pratītir yuktā / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4119: atha mā bhūd dṛṣṭa-virodha iti sarve sarvasya vācakāḥ / tathā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:4123: śabdasya-iṣṭa-vyaktim eva samayakāraḥ karoti iti kuta etat so aniyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:4126: api nāma asaṃkīrṇam arthaṃ jānīyām iti saṃkara-hetuḥ puruṣa-upākīrṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4127: tatra yādṛśāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacit prayuktāḥ saṃkīryante
SA15dhkpvsvu:4128: tādṛśā eva sarva-sādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ kvacit tair viniyamitās
SA15dhkpvsvu:4130: prakṛtyā eva vaidikā niyatā iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4132: apekṣeran na anyathā saṃketena prakāśayeyuḥ vyākhyā-vikalpaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4133: ca na syāt / upadeśasya ca iṣṭa-saṃvādaḥ śakya-vikalpe na asti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4135: vācyaś ca hetur bhinnānāṃ sambandhasya vyavasthiteḥ //229 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:4136: arthā hi bāhyā na rūpaṃ śabdasya na śabdo arthānām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4138: ātmatayā vyavasthā-bhede api nāntarīyakatā syāt / kṛtakatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4140: na apy ete vivakṣā-janmāno dhvanayo ajanmāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:4151: yady anityaḥ puruṣa-icchā vṛttir avṛttir vā / apuruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4152: adhīnatve puruṣāṇāṃ yathā abhiprāyaṃ deśa-ādi-parāvṛttyā tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:4156: ayam eva nityatve api doṣas tasya sthira-rūpasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4157: parāvṛtty-ayogād iti samaṃ sarva-avasthāne api iṣṭa-pratiniyama-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4158: tato viśeṣa-pratipattir na syād iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4159: icchā-vṛttau ca pauruṣeyatvam iti vipralambha-āśaṅkā / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4160: sambandhinām anityatvān na sambandhe asti nityatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4161: parāśrayo hi sambandho apratibandhe tayoḥ sambandhitā ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4163: apāye asya sambandhasya apy apāyaḥ anyathā anāśritaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4172: etat / sarvatra ca jāty-asambhavād ayogo yādṛcchikeṣu vyakti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4174: ca / tasmād anvaya-vyatirekiṇo bhāvasya bhāva-abhāvau sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4175: arthair ataḥ sa śabdānāṃ saṃskāryaḥ puruṣair dhiyā //231 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4176: tāv eva bhāva-abhāvāv āśritya-asaṃsṛṣṭāv api saṃsṛṣṭāv iva puruṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4178: saṃśleṣaḥ / kiṃ ca āśraya-vināśān naṣṭe sambandhe sa śabdaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:4187: atha mā bhūn naṣṭa-sambandhasya śabdasya artha-antare vaiguṇyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4188: arthānāṃ ca avācyatā ity utpanno arthaḥ sambandhavān yady utpadyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:4189: sa sambandha utpanno api na śabde syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4192: arthena saha utpannasya anyataḥ siddhasya anupakāriṇi śabde
SA15dhkpvsvu:4201: so ayam nityānām apy aparāvartayan svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4202: kutaścit svayam utprekṣya ghaṭayed iti te api tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4206: nityatvād āśraya-apāye apy anāśo yadi jāti-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4207: nityeṣv āśraya-sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ yena iṣṭaḥ sa āśrayaḥ //233//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4208: śrūyata etan nityā jātir āśrayitā ca na apy āśrayeṇa saha naśyati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4209: kevalaṃ nityeṣv āśraya-sāmarthyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ yena asāv āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4210: kṛtasya karaṇa-abhāvād akārakasya ca anapekṣatvāt / vyaktir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4211: upakāro jāteḥ sambandhasya ca āśrayāt tena āśraya iti cet
SA15dhkpvsvu:4215: vyañjakaiḥ svaiḥ kutaḥ ko artho vyaktās tais te yato matāḥ //235 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:4223: prasaṅgāt sāmarthyāc ca jñāna-utpatter nityaṃ ghaṭa-ādīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4228: rūpa-asādhanāt tu jñāna-vaśena kārya-atiśaya-vācinā śabdena viśeṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4231: kathaṃcid apy anupakāryatvād anupakāriṇā vyaktā yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4232: sambandhasya ca vastutve syād bhedād buddhi-citratā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4233: sa ca ayaṃ sambandho vastu bhavan niyamena śabda-arthābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4237: ity uktam / sa ca ayam aindriyaḥ san sva-buddhau tad-anya-vivekina-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4243: atīndriyatvād apratibhāse api indriya-ādiṣv iva adoṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:4244: iti cet / na / tato apratipatti-prasaṅgāt aprasiddhasya ajñāpakatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4246: na anumānāt pratipattir liṅga-abhāvāt dṛṣṭānta-asiddheś ca tatra apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:4248: tulyam indriya-ādiṣv api iti cet / na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4257: artho vā liṅgaṃ tayoḥ sarvatra yogyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4261: sā yuktā / tasyāṃ vā animittāyāṃ tad-viśeṣa-pratīti-niyama-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4262: artha-pratipādanam api śabdānām animittaṃ kiṃ na iṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4263: tat sadṛśaṃ liṅgaṃ sarva-sambandhe tato aviśeṣeṇa gamayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4264: tato aviśeṣeṇa eva pratītiḥ syāt sarvasya ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4270: sa eva sampradāya-apekṣo artha-jñāpanaṃ kiṃ na karoti / sa ca śabdo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4271: yad abhiprāyaiḥ prayujyamāno dṛṣṭo anyathā na dṛṣṭo darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4272: adarśanābhyāṃ dhūma-ādi-vat tat-pratītiṃ janayati iti sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4274: na ca atra anyasya sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4276: atha punar na śabda-arthayor anya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4278: tābhyām abhede tāv eva na ato anyā vastuno gatiḥ //236//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4283: na ca bheda-abhedau muktvā vastuno anyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4289: na hi śleṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ sambandho aśliṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4291: na ca artha-antaram eṣāṃ sambandhaḥ / yasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4292: sad-dravyaṃ syāt para-adhīnaṃ sambandho anyasya vā katham //237 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:4293: na hi siddhaṃ sat param apekṣate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4298: na hi svabhāva-antara-sattayā anyaḥ śliṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4299: mā bhūd aśliṣṭena śliṣṭena tu syād iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4301: tābhyāṃ śleṣa-asiddheḥ sa eva asiddho yas tau śleṣayet / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4302: atiprasaṅgo yady arthāv artha-antareṇa śliṣyato viśeṣa-abhāvāt / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4305: avastuni kathaṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhasya asya vastunaḥ //238//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4310: prasaṅgāt / krama-viśeṣeṇa vācakā varṇā iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4317: tad asati varṇānāṃ vācakatve pada-ādi vācakaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4321: padam / vākyaṃ ca eka-avabhāsi mithyā eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4325: na ca tad ekayā grāhyaṃ varṇa-anukrama-grahaṇāt / eka-varṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4349: vā śabdo tad-avyabhicārī iti tattvam asya sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4351: abhivyaktir vā avyabhicāra-āśrayaḥ pauruṣeyī iti pauruṣeya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4352: sambandhas tad-dvāreṇa ca artha-pratyāyane aniyamaḥ śabdānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4353: ity apauruṣeyatve api sa eva vipralambhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4354: apauruṣeyatā api iṣṭā kartṛṛṇām asmṛteḥ kila /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4355: yā api iyam apauruṣeyatā veda-vākyānāṃ kartur asmaraṇād varṇyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4356: santy asya apy anuvaktāra iti dhig vyāpakaṃ tamaḥ //239//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4357: tasya eva tāvad īdṛśaṃ prajñā-skhalitaṃ kathaṃ vṛttam iti savismaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4359: tad apare apy anuvadanti iti nirdaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4367: ka idānīm evaṃ pauruṣeyo anyo api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4368: kumārasambhava-ādiṣv ātmānam anyaṃ vā praṇetāram upadiśanto
SA15dhkpvsvu:4372: nanv idam eva abhyupagama-aṅgam iti kasya bādhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4377: akasmād grāhī ca ayaṃ kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4385: vā kvacid atiśayam abhyupeta ity apratyaya eva asya vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4396: yathā ayam anyato aśrutvā na imaṃ varṇa-pada-kramam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4397: vaktuṃ samarthaḥ puruṣas tathā anyo api iti kaścana //240//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4398: tasya api tad eva uttaram evam apauruṣeyatve api kim idānīṃ pauruṣeyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4400: anyo vā racito granthaḥ sampradāyād ṛte paraiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4401: dṛṣṭaḥ ko abhihito yena so apy evaṃ na anumīyate //241//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4402: na khalu kiṃcid anyad apauruṣeyatva-āśrayo anyatra idānīntanānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4404: sā ca anyatra apy ekena racite granthe anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4405: tulyā / tad-anusāriṇā sarvas tathā unneyo na vā kaścit / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4406: tathā aniṣṭatvād ity ādāv apy uktam iṣṭes tad-āśrayatvād ity ādi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4408: yaj-jātīyo yataḥ siddhaḥ sa tasmād agni-kāṣṭha-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4414: vyatikramān na tataḥ syād iti na kaścit tathā vacanīyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4415: rūpa-viśeṣo vā tathā darśanīyo ya enaṃ hetum anuvidadhyāt / yena iṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4418: abhedane bhāvānāṃ bhedaḥ syād ākasmika iti na kvacid vinivarteta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4419: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvo yaj-janmā dṛṣṭaḥ so anyatra apy avibhajyamānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4423: yathā-adyo api pathika-kṛto agnir jvālā-antara-pūrvako na araṇi-nirmathana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4432: jvālā-aprabhavatvam anyathā api syād iti dharmayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:4433: ekatra arthe sambhavāt sa pathika-agnir anyo vā artha eka-pratiniyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:4436: dharma-dvaya-avatāro vastu-sāmānye aviruddha ity ucyate na avasthā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4448: yad api vinā jvālayā syād anyatra api syād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4450: yayā sāmagryā sambhavati sā yadi syāt asyāḥ sambhavaṃ pradarśya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4451: tad-abhāvaṃ pradarśayet tatra vā jvālām syād etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4452: tasmān na ekasya para-pūrvakam adhyayanaṃ sarvasya tathābhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4457: evaṃ vācyaṃ syāt tad aviśeṣeṇa sambhavad-viśeṣam ucyamānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4460: teṣām api puruṣāṇām aśaktir eva idānīntana-puruṣa-vat / atra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4461: śakti-puruṣayor na kiṃcid virodha-darśanam iti na aviruddha-vidhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4470: yatra ekasya aśaktis tatra sarva-puruṣāṇām ity api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4480: dṛṣṭer ekasya kaścid dharmaṃ vivecayan tat-svabhāva-sambhavinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4490: yadi tādṛśīṃ racanāṃ puruṣāḥ kartuṃ na śaknuyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4491: kṛtāṃ vā akṛta-saṃketo vivecayet vyaktam apauruṣeyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4492: vedaḥ / nanu na śaknuvanty eva puruṣā mantrān kartum / etad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4498: vacanam / tad adyatve api puruṣeṣu dṛśyata eva / yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4500: śabarāṇāṃ ca keṣāṃcid adya api mantra-karaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4504: kṛteḥ / tatra apy apauruṣeyatve katham idānīm apauruṣeyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4505: avitatham / tathā hi bauddha-itarayor mantra-kalpayor hiṃsā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4507: tat katham ekatra viruddha-abhidhāyi dvayam satyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4508: syāt / tatra artha-antara-kalpane tad anyatra api tulyam ity artha-anirṇayāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4510: tathā ca sad apy anupayogam apauruṣeyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4519: yujyate / teṣāṃ kriyā-sambhave akṣara-racanāyāṃ kaḥ pratighātaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4520: puruṣāṇām / tasmān na kiṃcid aśakya-kriyam eṣām / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:4526: syāt / yadi pauruṣeyā mantrāḥ kiṃ na sarve puruṣā mantra-kāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4530: api ca kāvyāni puruṣaḥ karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4532: akaraṇe vā na eva kaścit tadvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4536: tat tu kasyacit sākalyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4538: uktam atra na mantro nāma anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4550: na api sann api sarvo draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ / ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:4552: na api puruṣeṣu utpitsoḥ kasyacid guṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4557: yādṛśo ayam asambhavat-tat-sādhana-sampradāyo na iti nyāyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4564: adoṣaḥ / kaḥ punar atiśayo veda-adhyayanasya yad anyathā adhyetuṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4565: na śakyate / na hi viśeṣaṇam aviruddhaṃ vipakṣeṇa asmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4577: tad-adhyayana-antara-pūrvakam ity api vyāptir na sidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4586: sarvathā anāditā sidhyed evaṃ na apuruṣa-āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4587: tasmād apauruṣeyatve syād anyo apy anara-āśrayaḥ //244//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4588: puruṣa eva hi svayam abhyūhya parato vā ādhīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4590: karaṇānāṃ svayaṃ śabdā dhvananti yena apauruṣeyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4591: api syur apauruṣeyā yadi puruṣāṇām ādiḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4609: samayānām api yathā aśruta-artha-vikalpa-saṃhāreṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4610: tat kiṃcit kutaścid āgatam ity ekasya upadeṣṭuḥ prabandhena abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4614: ādi-kalpikeṣv adṛṣṭā eva vyavahārāḥ paścāt pravṛttā iṣyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4615: na / teṣām apy anya-saṃskāra-āhitānāṃ yathā-pratyayaṃ prabodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4617: tādṛśe apauruṣeyatve kaḥ siddhe api guṇo bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4620: api keṣāṃcid anāditvād asti iti kim apauruṣeyatvena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4623: yadi apauruṣeyatve api pratiniyatām eva tad-artha-pratibhāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4627: ca te arthās teṣāṃ na saṃghaṭante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4637: api ca / ayam apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhayan varṇānāṃ vā sādhayed
SA15dhkpvsvu:4639: anya-aviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4645: ca / teṣāṃ ca apauruṣeyatva-sādhane te tulyāḥ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:4648: na ca sarvo avitatha iti vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4651: vākyaṃ na bhinnaṃ varṇebhyo vidyate anupalambhanāt //247//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4652: na hi vayaṃ devadatta-ādi-pada-vākyeṣu dakāra-ādi-pratibhāsaṃ muktvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4655: na ca apratibhāsamānaṃ grahaṇe grāhyatayā iṣṭam asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:4660: syād etat yadi teṣu varṇeṣu satsu api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4662: na bhavati teṣām aviśeṣe api pada-vākya-antare
SA15dhkpvsvu:4670: ca / varṇa-aviśeṣe api vākya-bhedāt pratipatti-bhedaḥ kārya-bhedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4672: tac ca atīndriyam iti kutaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4676: nāma kiṃcid artha-antaraṃ varṇebhyo yasya apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4680: tad aneka-avayava-ātmakaṃ vā syād anavayavaṃ vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4682: te api tasya bahavo avayavāḥ pṛthak prakṛtyā yady anarthakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4689: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4695: pṛthak pṛthag iti pratyekaṃ te vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4703: sakṛc śrutau ca sarveṣāṃ kāla-bhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4704: atha mā bhūd avayava-antara-apratīkṣaṇena ekasmād eva avayavād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4705: vākya-artha-siddher aneka-avayavatva-hānir vākyasya iti sakṛt sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4707: tadā api kāla-kṣepo na yukta eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4710: ca pṛthag arthavatām ekasmād eva tad-artha-siddher anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4712: sakṛc śrutau ca pṛthag artheṣv adṛṣṭa-sāmarthyānām
