SA15dhkpvsvu:4715: na / pṛthag asato rūpasya saṃghāte apy asambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4717: ca / śabda-utpāda-vādinas tāvad ayam adoṣa eva / pṛthag
SA15dhkpvsvu:4722: atha punar ekam eva anavayavaṃ vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4724: ekatve api hy abhinnasya kramaśo gaty-asambhavāt //250//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4737: prayuktair api yat kiṃcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta vinā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4738: varṇaiḥ / tair anukramavadbhir akramasya upakāra-ayogāt / akrameṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:4741: vākye varṇāḥ santi tad ekam eva śabda-rūpaṃ vyañjaka-anukrama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4742: vaśād anukrama-vad varṇa-vibhāga-vac ca pratibhāti iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4743: anukramavatā vyañjakena akramasya vyaktiḥ pratyuktā / vyakta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4744: avyakta-virodhād avarṇa-bhāge ca vākye asakala-śrāviṇo asakala-vākya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4745: gatir na syāt ekasya śakala-abhāvāt sakala-śrutir na vā kasyacit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4750: varṇānāṃ ca akrameṇa apratipatteḥ kuto akramam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4753: ūrdhvam anyam aśakalaṃ śabda-ātmānam upalakṣayāmaḥ / na api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4756: me syād iti kalyāṇa-kāmatā-mūḍha-matir antyāyāṃ buddhau samāpta-kalaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4759: api pada-vākyayor varṇāḥ krama-viśeṣam antareṇa vibhāvyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4765: sati vā tad anityaṃ vā syān
SA15dhkpvsvu:4767: anityaṃ yatna-sambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4768: avaśyaṃ hy anityam utpattimat kutaścid bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4770: sattvasya deśa-ādi-niyamo na syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4777: atha tac śabda-rūpaṃ nityaṃ syād upalabhya-svabhāvaṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4778: sa ca tasya svabhāvaḥ kadācin na apaiti iti nityam upalabhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4779: evaṃ hi sa nityaḥ syād yadi na kutaścit sāmarthyāt pracyavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4783: na api tasya upalabhya-ātmanaḥ kiṃcid upalambha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4789: akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya āvaraṇam anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4792: utpādayanti khaṇḍayanti vā yena āvaraṇam iṣyante / na brūmas
SA15dhkpvsvu:4794: api tu na sarve ghaṭa-kṣaṇāḥ sarvasya indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4800: vā anyasya sarvadā syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4808: samartha-nirodhāt sati kuḍye anyasya utpitsoḥ kāraṇa-abhāvena anutpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4812: athavā sambhavaty api bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikānām anyonya-upakāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:4814: yad indriya-viṣaya-madhya-sthitam āvaraṇaṃ tat tau vijñāna-utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4819: saṃnidhānasya apy asaṃnidhāna-tulyatvāt tasya idam ity /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4835: svabhāvaḥ sarvasya sarvadā sarvāṇi sva-viṣaya-jñānāni sakṛj
SA15dhkpvsvu:4836: janayeyuḥ / no cen na kadācit kasyacit kiṃcid ity ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4838: syād etat / na āvaraṇān nityaṃ sarve śabdā na śrūyante / api tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4839: kiṃcit teṣāṃ pratipattau sahakāri pratiniyatam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4841: kasyacid bhavati iti tat-kṛtam eṣāṃ kadācit kvacic śravaṇam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4842: kāmam anya-pratīkṣā astu niyamas tu virudhyate //252//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4843: na vai vayaṃ kāraṇānāṃ sahakārīṇi pratikṣipāmaḥ / kiṃ tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:4847: tathā śabdo api yadi kiṃcid apekṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4848: kāryaṃ kuryāt karotu pūrva-svabhāva-niyata ity etan na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4851: na hy anupakāry apekṣyata ity uktam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4853: ca arthāntaratve tasya iti sambandha-abhāva-ādayo apy uktāḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4857: na saṃnikarṣaṃ na ātmānam anyad vā kiṃcij jñāna-utpatti-samāśrayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4860: api ca / ete śabdā vyāpino vā syur avyāpino vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4861: sarvatra anupalambhaḥ syāt teṣām avyāpitā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4869: sati ca upalambha-pratyaye sarvatra deśe tulyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4872: sarveṣām upalambhaḥ syād yugapad vyāpitā yadi //253//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4873: na hi kaścic śabda kvacin na asti iti sarve yugapad upalabhyeran
SA15dhkpvsvu:4877: saṃskṛtasya upalambhe ca kaḥ saṃskartā avikāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4878: syād etat / sann api na sarvaḥ śabda upalabhyate sarveṇa /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4883: indriyasya hi saṃskāraḥ śṛṇuyān nikhilaṃ ca tat //254//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4884: tatra yadi saṃskṛtena upalambha ity asaṃskṛtena indriyo na upalabhate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4885: yasya saṃskāra indriyasya kṛtaḥ sa sarva-śabdān yugapac śṛṇuyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4892: saṃskṛtam indriyaṃ kasyacid eva grāhakam iti na yugapat sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4895: śabda-saṃghātasya kalakalasya śrutir na syāt / na hy ekaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4906: dhvanayaḥ kevalaṃ tatra śrūyante cen na vācakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4912: dhvanibhyo bhinnam asti iti śraddhā iyaṃ atibahv idam //256//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4913: na hi vayaṃ dhvaniṃ śabdaṃ ca vācakaṃ pṛthag-rūpam upalakṣayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4920: sthiteṣv anyeṣu śabdeṣu śrūyate vācakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4921: na dhvanir ato bhinnas tena saha pṛthag vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4925: kevalam eva śabdaṃ śṛṇvaṃs tad-upalambha-pratyayānāṃ tad-anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4934: na ca kalakale vācako na śrūyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4937: tāni pratiniyata-śaktīny api indriyāṇi nānā-rūpān prati-śabda-niyatān
SA15dhkpvsvu:4938: dhvanīn śṛṇvanti na tv evaṃ śabdān iti kaḥ śabdeṣv eṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4939: nirvedaḥ / yad uktaṃ na dhvanayo bhedena vācakebhyaḥ siddhā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4944: na ca so anyaṃ sama iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4946: bhāgeṣu dhvaniṣu na sambhavati iti siddham akrama-sattvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4955: eva / krama-bhāvina eva yathāsvaṃ karaṇa-prayogād bhinnā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4956: varṇa-bhāgāḥ karma-bhāgā vā krameṇa vikalpa-viṣayā yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4957: saṃketam eva artha-pratītiṃ janayanti iti nyāyyam / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4958: dhvanayaḥ sammatā yais te doṣaiḥ kair apy avācakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4959: dhvanibhir vyajyamāne asmin vācake api kathaṃ na te //258//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4960: krama-utpādibhir dhvani-bhāgair vyaktaḥ kila vācako vakti / tam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4961: api te na eva sakṛt prakāśayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4975: tulya-upayoga iti dhvanibhir aśakya-sādhanaṃ kāryam / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4977: tasmān na varṇeṣu vākye vā apauruṣeyatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4978: varṇa-anupūrvī vākyaṃ cen na varṇānām abhedataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4979: na artha-antaram eva śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam apauruṣeyam / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4982: iti cet / na / varṇānām ānupūrvyā abhedāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4989: mātram avaśiṣṭaṃ sarvatra iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4991: yady akṛtaka-anupūrvī varṇānāṃ te ca na bahavaḥ samāna-jātīyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4992: yena kecid vyavasthita-kramāḥ syuḥ anye yathā iṣṭa-parāvṛttayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4993: kiṃ tarhi eka eva trailokye akāras tathā gakāraḥ tadā agnir ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:4994: eva syāt na gaganam iti akāra-gakārayoḥ pūrvāpara-bhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5011: sā ca iyam ānupūrvī vārṇānāṃ deśa-kṛtā vā syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5022: ca / tathā kāla-parihāreṇa vṛttiḥ kāla-paurvāparyam / yadā eko
SA15dhkpvsvu:5024: tad api nityeṣu na sambhavati / sarvadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5029: anitya-avyāpitāyāṃ ca doṣaḥ prāg eva kīrtitaḥ //260//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5030: atha mā bhūd ayaṃ doṣa ity anityān avyāpinaś ca varṇān icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5031: tāv api pakṣau prāg eva nirākṛtāv ity aparihāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5037: iti tadā anupūrvī vākyam ity api mithyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5042: vyāpārād eva tat-siddheḥ karaṇānāṃ ca kāryatā //261//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5043: yat khalu rūpaṃ yata eva upalabhyate tasya tad-upalabdhi-nāntarīyakām
SA15dhkpvsvu:5044: upalabdhim eva āśritya lokaḥ kāryatāṃ prajñāpayati / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5046: sa eva ca anyatra api tad-āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5048: kathaṃ tulye abhyupagama-nibandhane na varṇāḥ kāryāḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5053: sā sattā kutaḥ siddhā ye na kāryatāṃ sādhayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5054: na hy asiddhāyām asyām evaṃ bhavati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5061: nanu tad rūpam asiddham eva yat tathābhūta-vijñāna-avyavadhāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5062: upayogi / siddham eva tad anya-vaikalyān na upayuktam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5065: śabda-svabhāva-asaṃsparśī tasya eva atiśayasya upayoga-siddhes tasyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5067: yasya eva bhāve sādhya-siddhis tad eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5072: anatiśayasya apekṣā ca prāg eva niṣiddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5073: sa ca karaṇa-vyāpārād eva siddha iti sarva-kārya-tulya-dharmā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5074: tasya tādṛśasya vyaktau sarvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ na vā kiṃcid apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:5076: sva-jñānena anya-dhī-hetuḥ siddhe arthe vyañjako mataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5077: yathā dīpo anyathā vā api ko viśeṣo asya kārakāt //262//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5079: dīpa-ādi-vat sa cet prāk siddhaḥ syāt samāna-jātīya-upādāna-kṣaṇa-siddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5080: na tasya eva atiśayasya jñāna-hetoḥ tasya tat-sāmagrī-pratyayatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5081: ye punar asiddha-upalambhanāḥ kārakā eva kulāla-ādi-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:5082: ghaṭa-ādau / pratyabhijñāna-ādayo api siddhi-hetavo na hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5083: puṣṇanti / yad api kiṃcid uttarā akāra-pratītir akāra-pratīteḥ pūrva-abhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5099: iti cet / iha api virodha-abhāvaḥ kena siddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5101: artha-bhedena vyāptā na sādhyate tāvat sandigdho
SA15dhkpvsvu:5104: śrutau niviśamāno yadā ekaḥ sādhyate kiṃ na ghaṭa-ādayaḥ / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:5105: api śakyam evaṃ vyañjaka-bhedāt pratibhāsa-bheda iti pratyavasthātum /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5109: na hi kadācid vyāpṛteṣu karaṇeṣu śabda-anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5122: dharmā / na ca asya kaścid atiśaya ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5133: tatra api indriya-yogya-deśatā-ādibhyaḥ karaṇānām atiśayāt / ghaṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5140: vā karaṇebhyo atiśayattā vā śabdasya vyaktir āvaraṇa-vigamo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5145: tad-rūpa-āvaraṇānāṃ ca vyaktis te vigamo yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5146: abhāve karaṇa-grāma-sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ nu tad bhavet //264//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5147: na hy āvaraṇasya akiṃcitkarāṇi karaṇāni samarthāni nāma / vigamaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:5148: ca abhāvaḥ / na ca abhāvaḥ kāryam iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5150: nityasya kiṃcid āvaraṇam asāmarthyād ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5158: yadi sarva-kāraṇa-samāna-dharmāṇy api karaṇāni vyañjakāni na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5166: vastu-vad eva jñānasya api siddhatvāt / jñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5167: prati kārakatve kasyacit tathābhūtānām anyeṣām api tathābhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5170: kāraka-abhimato artha-kalāpo na vyaktau na kriyāyām iti vyartha
SA15dhkpvsvu:5171: eva syāt / tathā ca idam anupakārya-upakārakaṃ nirīhaṃ jagat syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5175: kṣaṇa-bhaṅgino hi sarva-bhāvā vināśasya akāraṇatvād ity uktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5179: tan na idaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sat-prayoga-ādikaṃ kvacid anveti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5187: ucyate / tasya eva abhedasya sarvatra paurvāparyeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5190: tena eva saṃśayo astu / na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:5192: viveka-adarśanād ekatvam iti cet / na / jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5195: yady aparāṇi jñānāni prāk saṃnihita-kāraṇāni pūrva-jñāna-vaj jātāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:5196: eva syuḥ / ajātāni tu kāraṇa-vaikalyaṃ sūcayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5200: tad ayam sat-prayoga ity api jananam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5203: prayoga ity api iṣṭa-sādhana-samartha-utpādanam eva samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5207: pratyakṣam eva tataḥ pratyakṣād eva sthairya-siddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:5210: na eva kaścid dharmo yaḥ samāna-jātīyam anveti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5217: yadi vyaktir buddhis tadā ānupūrvī vādyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5221: pratyakṣaṃ khalv apy etad yad imā buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5224: na ca kāryatā nāma anyā bhāva-abhāva-viśeṣābhyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5225: sa ca bhāvaḥ pratyakṣo abhāvo apy anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5229: ānupūrvyāś ca varṇebhyo bhedaḥ sphoṭena cintitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5230: kalpanā-āropitā sā syāt kathaṃ vā apuruṣa-āśrayā //268//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5240: svabhāvasya abhāvād bhavatā dhvaninā anātyantikena bhavitavyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5241: sa ca ahetuko anya-hetuko vā nityaṃ bhaven na ca puruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5246: na hi nāśo bhāvānāṃ kutaścid bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5248: bhāvasya eva sva-hetubhyas tad-dharmaṇo bhāvāt / na ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5253: tena śabdo anyo vā sattā-bhājanaḥ sarva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5270: kim ity artha-antarād artha-antara-janmani kāṣṭham abhūtaṃ nāma
SA15dhkpvsvu:5273: sa eva asya vināśa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5274: yadi sa eva artho agni-janmā abhāvas tad idam abhūtatvān na dṛśyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:5275: iti / bhavatu tasya idaṃ nāma abhāva iti / tathā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:5284: kāṣṭhe agni-kṛtaḥ svabhāvo vināśo na sarva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5297: pūrveṇa asya kaḥ sambandha iti sa eva prasaṅgo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5300: atiśayaṃ pratyupakurvāṇo agnir apūrvam eva janayati iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5304: tat-kārī ca akāraka eva ity anapekṣaṇīya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5305: ity uktam / svabhāva-abhāvasya ca tato bhede tato nivartamānasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5306: bhāvasya svabhāva eva samarthitaḥ syād iti katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:5308: anyo anyasya vināśo astu kāṣṭhaṃ kasmān na dṛśyate //270//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5310: tat-parigrahataś cen na tena anāvaraṇaṃ yataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5311: yadi tena artha-antareṇa parigṛhītam iti kāṣṭhaṃ na dṛśyeta tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:5314: hi darśanaṃ bibadhnīyān na abhighāṭa-ādīni dravya-sāmarthyāni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5315: sarva-pratibandhe ca nanv anena eva dravyaṃ vināśitaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5317: punas tatra apy agnāv iva prasaṅgād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5318: anavasthā / apracyuteṣu vā asya abhighāṭa-sāmarthya-ādiṣu satā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5322: vināśasya vināśitvaṃ syād utpattes tataḥ punaḥ //271//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5328: yathā atra apy evam iti ced dhantur na amaraṇatvataḥ //272//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5334: na brūmo vināśa-hetor agni-daṇḍa-āder nivṛttau bhāvena bhavitavyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5344: tan-nivṛttau ca syād eva asya punarbhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5345: ananyatve api nāśasya syān nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva tu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5346: tasya sattvād ahetutvaṃ na ato anyā vidyate gatiḥ //273 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5349: ca prāg eva asti iti kim atra sāmarthyaṃ vahny-ādīnām / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:5355: pāraṃparyeṇa upakāre apy avaśyam ayaṃ vikalpo anveti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5356: sa kim upakāro artha-antaram āhosvit tad eva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5358: api tasya iti punar upakāratva-ādi-paryanuyogas tad-avasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5362: tad-atat-kriyā-vikalo na kartā eva iti na kasyacid hetur ahetuś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:5364: tasmāt svayam ayaṃ bhāvas tat-svabhāva iti siddham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5367: syād etad yasya api vināśo ahetukaḥ so avaśyaṃ nitya iti bhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:5368: tad-abhāva-lakṣaṇo vināśaś ca saha syātām iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5372: na hy asaty ayaṃ vikalpaḥ sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5379: yasmād bhāvasya nāśena na vināśanam iṣyate //275//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5384: vināśa iti kiṃcin na ity āha sa kathaṃ tato bhāva-nāśam icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5385: katham idānīm asati vināśe bhāvo naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5389: sa tena tathā vyapadiśyate pratīyate vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5391: na vai vināśo na asty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5392: sa tu na asti yo bhāvasya bhavanti / bhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5395: kālaṃ vibhāvayanto vināśo asya bhūta iti yathā-pratīti vyapadiśanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5396: ity uktam / na hi bhāvasya kiṃcit kadācid bhavati / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5400: svabhāva eva asya yena sa naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5401: kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ahetuko vināśo bhavati ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5402: naśyan bhāvo apara-apekṣa iti taj-jñāpanāya sā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5403: avasthā ahetur uktā asyā bhedam āropya cetasā //276//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5404: na bhāvo jāto aparasmān nāśaṃ pratilabhate tathābhūtasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5406: svabhāva-jñāpanena artha-antaram iva dharmiṇo dharmaṃ cetasā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5407: vibhajya tan-mātra-jijñāsāyāṃ svabhāva eva tathā ucyate / tad etan
SA15dhkpvsvu:5409: nāśaṃ guṇaṃ tasya ca bhāvam āropya sahetukam ahetukaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5411: svato api bhāve abhāvasya vikalpaś ced ayaṃ samaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5412: nanv aparabhāvitve api vināśasya svata eva bhāvasya bhavato
SA15dhkpvsvu:5415: bhāvo na dṛśyate anarthāntaratve api tad eva tad bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5416: tan na kiṃcid asya jātam iti kathaṃ vinaṣṭo nāma / nanv atra /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5417: na tasya kiṃcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam //277//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5418: ity uktam / na hy ayaṃ vināśo anyo vā kaścid bhāvasya bhavati ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:5420: sa eva bhāvo na bhavati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5422: brūyāt na bhāvo anena nivartitaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5427: tadā na bhūto yadi svayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5428: bhavet / na bhavati iti ca prasajyapratiṣedha eṣa na paryudāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5429: anyathā iha api kasyacid bhāve na pratiṣedha-paryudāsayo rūpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5432: kasyacit paryudāso api kvacin na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5436: ca na asti / sarvatra nivṛttir bhavati ity ukte kasyacid bhāvasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5437: pratītiḥ / tathā ca anena artha-antara-bhāva eva uktaḥ syāt / na tayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5444: sa ca na asti ity apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5446: tasmād yasya nāśo bhavati ity ucyate sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5447: svayam eva na bhavati ity uktaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5451: nāma-karaṇād bāleya-dharmā manuṣye api saṃyojyāḥ / tathā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5452: caitrasya putro bhavati ity atra dṛṣṭo vidhir nāśe api virodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5453: evaṃ ca abhidhāne api prayojanam āveditam eva / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5454: bhāve hy eṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidher vastv-anurodhataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5462: katham idānīṃ bhavaty abhāvaḥ śaśa-viṣāṇam ity ādi-vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5463: na vai śaśa-viṣāṇaṃ kiṃcid bhavati ity ucyate / api tv evam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5464: asya na bhavati iti bhāva-pratiṣedha eva kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5467: eva etad evaṃ vyāpāra-vad iva samāropya ādarśayanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5473: tad-bhāvāt / asāv api yadi vaktṛbhir evaṃ khyāpyate na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5474: tu svayaṃ tathā tadā na kiṃcid bhavati iti iṣṭam eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5476: bhavan svabhāvo vikalpa-dvayaṃ na ativartate tattvam anyattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5482: ko ayaṃ pratibandho nāma yena sa ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5487: tathā ca sarvaḥ sarvasya kathaṃcid upayogi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5488: iti na kaścit kutaścid anyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5489: evaṃ ca avācyatā ity api kāryakāraṇabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5505: yaj-jñānaṃ tad-gatau niyamena tat-pratibhāsanāt tad atad-rūpam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5508: tasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt svayam / sa eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5512: api na tad-rūpaṃ jñānam iti kasya kim āyattā pratipattiḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5513: ca yad yad āyattā-pratītikaṃ tasya svabhāva-pratibhāsa eva naśyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5516: tatra yat tasminn anātma-rūpe pratīyamāne sa svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5528: nanu sa eva asati pratibandhe na yuktā ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5529: na akārya-kāraṇayoḥ kaścit pratibandha iti ca uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5531: nāntarīyakaṃ yaj-jñānam ity api taj-jñāne sati syāt / na hi yo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5532: vijñāne svarūpeṇa asvarūpa-asaṃsargeṇa na pratibhāsate tasya kiṃcij
SA15dhkpvsvu:5533: jñānam / tad-abhāvān na sidhyati avācyatā-lakṣaṇam artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5534: rūpasya / tad bhavatā vastutas tattvānyattva-bhājā bhavitavyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5535: yasya tu vinaśyato bhāvasya na kiṃcid bhavati / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:5536: na bhāvo bhavati ity uktam abhāvo bhavati ity api //278//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5537: yad apy ayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvo bhavati ity āha /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5539: na bhavati ity eva uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5542: tata eva asya vināśe na kaścid hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5544: apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryaṃ yadi vidyata kiṃcana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5545: yad akiṃcitkaraṃ vastu kiṃ kenacid apekṣyate //279//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5549: tasmād yo nāma nāśa-hetuḥ sa bhāve na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5550: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaro na apekṣyaṇīyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5552: anutpanna-atiśayas tad-avastha eva bhāvo naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5553: nanv atiśaya-utpattāv api sa eva tasya atiśaya utpanna iti kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5555: tena na ayaṃ tad-avastho naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5558: na artha-antara-utpādād ity uktam / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:5565: etena ahetukatve api hy abhūtvā nāśa-bhāvataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5567: yo api manyate ahetuke api vināśe abhūtvā asya bhāvāt sattā-anityatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5569: abhūtvā bhavann ahetuko bhavati ity api
SA15dhkpvsvu:5573: yathā keṣāṃcid eva iṣṭaḥ pratigho janmināṃ tathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5574: nāśaḥ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na anutpattimatāṃ yadi //281//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5576: bhavatu nāma svabhāva eṣa bhāvānāṃ ya ime kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5580: iti sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo bhavati pratigha-ātmatā-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5583: na anitye rūpa-bhedo asti bhedakānām abhāvataḥ //282//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5584: na vai pratigho anyo vā svabhāvo akasmāt pratiniyamavān / yādṛśī
SA15dhkpvsvu:5585: tu sva-hetoḥ śakti-sthitis tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati iti hetu-svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5593: nanv idam apy aniśceyam eva sarva-ākāra-janmāno naśyanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5596: tatra kācit syād api yā anaśvara-ātmānaṃ janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5599: ye kadācit kvacit kenacij jñātāḥ santo na jñāyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:5602: sādhyante / na hy ayaṃ sambhavo asti yat te jñāna-janana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5603: svabhāvāḥ punar anaṣṭā na janayeyur apekṣeran vā param /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5612: vakṣyāmaḥ / tasya ca vināśa-avyabhicārāt sa sattā-anubandhī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5613: pratyākhyeyā ata eva eṣāṃ sambandhasya api nityatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5614: ata eva yathā uktād vastu-mātra-anubandhād vināśasya śabda-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:5617: artha-pratipattyā āśrayo jaiminīyair varṇyate sa artha-antaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:5620: yogyatā iti rūpa-atiśaya eva bhāvānām ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:5623: sambandha-doṣaiḥ prāg uktaiḥ śabda-śaktiś ca dūṣitā //283//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5624: ukto hi sambandha-artha-antara-vāde aneka-prakāro doṣaḥ / tena eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5625: sā śabda-śaktir dūṣitā iti na punar ucyate / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5626: na apauruṣeyam ity eva yathā artha-jñāna-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5627: dṛṣṭo anyathā api vahny-ādir aduṣṭaḥ puruṣa-āgasā //284//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5628: bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5646: ekatra yathārtha-jñāna-hetavo api sarvatra tathā bhavanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5647: tathā śabdānām apy apauruṣeyatve apy ubhayaṃ syād iti / bhavatu
SA15dhkpvsvu:5649: na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣv etad asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5651: apy asty eva dharmas teṣām api saṃketa-balād anyathā-vṛtteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5652: kārya-janana-svabhāva-sthitau ca eṣāṃ samaya-āder apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5653: tataḥ pratītir artheṣu sarvasya sarvadā syāt / na ca asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5654: tasmān na śabdāḥ sthita-svabhāvā iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5655: na jñāna-hetutā eva syāt tasminn akṛtake mate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5656: nityebhyo avastu-sāmarthyān na hi janma asti kasyacit //285//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5657: yady akṛtakaḥ śabdo na tasmād artheṣu pratītir eva syāt / pratīti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5660: evam ayaṃ janako na evam iti vivecanīyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5662: na yādṛśo asya ajanakas tādṛśa eva janako
SA15dhkpvsvu:5667: kārya-sātatya-adarśanāc ca na te kathaṃcit kartāra ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:5669: yā apy etā nitya-abhimateṣv ākāśa-ādiṣu pratipattayas
SA15dhkpvsvu:5670: tā api na tat-svabhāva-bhāvinyaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5672: jāyante buddhayas tatra kevalaṃ na artha-gocarāḥ //286//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5674: iti tasmin saty asyāḥ kāraṇe yogye sā bhavaty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5675: tad yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit jñānaṃ syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:5681: bhāvaḥ kenacid gṛhyamāṇas tat-kāraṇa-apekṣo yadi grahaṇam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5682: janayet yuktaṃ yat tena eva gṛhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5685: sarveṇa samaṃ gṛhyeta na vā kenacid iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5686: san kenacid dṛṣṭo na nityaḥ kaścid atīndriyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5688: tasmād artha-sāmarthya-anapekṣāḥ samāropita-gocarā āntaram eva upādānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5694: eva iti / na hy agnir himasya bheṣajam ity ādiṣu śīta-pratighāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5695: sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ agneḥ khyāpyata iti sarvaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5697: lokaḥ sva-saṃketam anuvidadhad evaṃ pratyeti āhosvic śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5700: śabdāḥ punar anyatra anyathā dṛśyanta iti loka-prasiddhy-anuvidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:5703: darśane api sarveṣāṃ tathābhāvo na sidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5705: api hy eṣāṃ kaścin mithyā-artha-niyato api syād iti svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5707: mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣv eva dṛṣṭam ity akṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5709: atha yan mithyā-arthaṃ vacanaṃ tad akhilaṃ kṛtakam iti hetu-vyatirekeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5711: satya-artham iti syād vinā apy anvayena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5715: asti / asambhave ca vijātīyasya gaty-antara-abhāvād iṣṭa-artha-siddhes
SA15dhkpvsvu:5721: hetāv asambhave anukte bhāvas tasya api śaṅkyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5723: yadi hetoḥ sādhya-vipakṣe abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhya-vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5729: na ca ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra asambhava
SA15dhkpvsvu:5735: na asattā-siddhir ity uktaṃ sarvato anupalambhanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5737: na hy ayaṃ puruṣa-mātrakaḥ sarvaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho yena asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5740: na vyabhicarati sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ śobheta adarśanān na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5741: tad ime svabhāva-deśa-kāla-viprakarṣeṇa santo apy anupalakṣyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5744: vā sarva-darśī vacanasya akṛtakasya itarasya vā vibhāvayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5745: pratipāditaṃ ca etat kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām apy arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5746: punaḥ kathaṃcid anyathābhāvaḥ yathā kvacid deśe madhurāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5748: ca idānīm atad-darśinā tāni pratikṣeptavyāny eva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5750: ca syād syān mithyā-arthaṃ ca iti na virodhaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:5751: hi iyam anupalabdhir adṛśya-ātmasv abhāva-sādhikā ity uktam / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:5752: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam ity aniścayād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5754: anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhya-dharmiṇi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5757: ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:5759: iti / ko hy adṛṣṭa-virodhasya sambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta / tad ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5762: sa eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo hetur ato anvayī //291//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5763: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam iti hetu-vipakṣeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:5764: sādhya-vipakṣasya vyāptis tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau syāt / tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:5768: pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5769: siddhiḥ / tan na kaścid hetur ananvayo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5780: rūpatvāt / abhāva-rūpas tu vyatirekaḥ sa ca vyatiricyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:5781: bhāvam upasthāpayati na evaṃ nairātmya-ādayaḥ svabhāva-viśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5786: mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5793: tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5795: tathā anairātmye api na bhāva-siddhiḥ / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5796: na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇa-ādimattvād iti vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:5798: dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5811: siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5817: dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5818: abhāvāt / te tv anarthakā api syur iti na iṣṭasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5826: tathā ayam anarthakeṣv artha-vikalpaḥ puruṣa-kṛtaḥ na tu śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5828: na hi prakṛtyā prakāśanās tam apekṣante vahny-ādayaḥ / puruṣas
SA15dhkpvsvu:5829: tu sva-samaya-vyāpāram ācakṣāṇa upadiśati iti nyāyyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5831: ca eko naisargiko anyas tu pauruṣeya iti duravasānam / asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5841: arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa-anurodhinī ca / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:5842: ca idaṃ mantrā apauruṣeyāś ca iti vyāhataṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5844: yuktam / yady ete mantrāḥ kasyacit samayo yathā mat-praṇītam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5846: anena arthena yojayāmi iti parārtha-paratā-anurodhena anyato vā kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:5847: hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tadā mantra-prayogāt kadācit artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5849: atha api bhāva-śaktiḥ syād anyatra apy aviśeṣataḥ //292//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5852: svabhāva eṣa yad ime kathaṃcin niyuktāḥ phaladāḥ / tat tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5853: rūpaṃ varṇānāṃ sarvatra aviśiṣṭam iti yathākathaṃcit prayuktād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5855: varṇā eva hi mantro na anyat kiṃcit / tat-kramo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5857: kramasya arthāntaratvaṃ ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5858: na varṇa-vyatirikto anyaḥ krama iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5861: te ca aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra iti sarvadā phaladāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5862: syuḥ / upaplavas tv alpīyaso api kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5864: ca / sarva-bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya ananuṣṭhānād asaṃnidher
SA15dhkpvsvu:5867: vā varṇa-ātmanas tat-krama-ātmano vā mantrasya artha-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:5870: yato hi bhāva-śakteḥ phala-utpattiḥ sā avikalā iti na phala-vaikalyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5871: syāt / na hi kāraṇa-sākalye kārya-vaikalyaṃ yuktam / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:5876: yadi mantrā vidhānād anyato vā kaṃcit svabhāva-atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5880: tat kim ayam asamartho apekṣyata ity anapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5881: sadā kuryur na vā kadācid anatiśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5882: sarvasya sādhanaṃ te syur bhāva-śaktir yad īdṛśī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5884: yadi bhāva-śaktayā eva mantrāḥ siddhi-pradā na te kaṃcit parihareyur
SA15dhkpvsvu:5886: na hy anyaṃ prati svabhāvo atad-bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:5887: bhavati / tasya tena anapakarṣaṇād anyena ca anutkarṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5890: abhāvāt / ata eva asya asaṃskāryatvāt prayoktā api na asti / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5892: saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu-bhedo hi bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5893: prayoktṛ-bhedān niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet //295//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5901: prāyam / tad ime mantrāḥ svabhāva-atiśayāt phaladāyinaḥ kāryā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5902: api na śūdra-ādi-prayoge apy anyathā syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5911: na tadvad anayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇaṃ viniyataṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5915: bheda-anvayo loke pratīti-bhedaḥ so asaty api jāti-bhede vyāpāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5917: tad ime aviśiṣṭena prayujyamānā mantrās tato aviśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:5919: tena aviśeṣeṇa eva phaladāḥ syuḥ / yadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5920: tu samayād ebhyaḥ phalaṃ tadā ayam adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5927: yad api prayoktā phalam aśnuta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5932: yena tataḥ kaścit phalam aśnute anyo na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5933: prayogo yady abhivyaktiḥ sā prāg eva nirākṛtā //296//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5934: na hi nityānāṃ kācid abhivyaktir ity uktam yato abhivyañjakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5936: vyaktiś ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalair yadi yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5937: syāc śrotaḥ phala-sambandho vaktā hi vyakti-kāraṇam //297//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5938: na hi śabdasya anyataḥ svarūpa-pariṇāmo vyaktir na apy āvaraṇa-vigamanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5939: kiṃ tu tad-viṣayā pratītir aśrūyamāṇe avyakta-vyapadeśāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5940: tatra yadi buddhi-hetur vaktā syāt tat tulyaṃ śrotary api iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:5945: na vaktur iti viśeṣa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5954: tac ca na śakyam tasya kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:5957: śrāvayaty ahaṃ śrāvayāmi iti tayoḥ pratyayād vaktṛ-śrotṛ-bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:5958: iti cet / anupakārya-upakārakād bhrānti-mātrāt tad-bhāve atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5963: prasaṅgāt / bhrāntir api kutaścid upakāre sati kayācit pratyāsattyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:5965: sa apy atyanta-anupakāre na syāt / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5969: manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syāc śabdo hi śrotra-gocaraḥ //298//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5973: na brūmaḥ śabda eva iti / śabdas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:5974: avaśyaṃ tal-lakṣaṇas tasya lakṣaṇa-antara-abhāvāt / tatra yadi
SA15dhkpvsvu:5976: śruti-viṣayāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā jāpī na mantra-phalena
SA15dhkpvsvu:5978: na hi tadā śrotreṇa kaṃcid arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:5981: pāraṃparyeṇa tajjatvāt tad-vyaktiḥ sā api cen matiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5982: na hi manasā dhyāyato api mantra-ābhāsā buddhiḥ śabda-śravaṇād
SA15dhkpvsvu:5983: ṛte / tataḥ śabda-prabhavāt sā api śabda-vyaktir eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5985: syāt / śabda-artha-vikalpānām api paraṃparayā prasūtir asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5988: tathā syus tad-arthā ced asiddhaṃ kalpanā-anvayāt //299//
SA15dhkpvsvu:5989: na brūmaḥ sarvā śabda-prabhavā buddhis tad-vyaktir iti / yā tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:5992: asiddham / na hi svalakṣaṇe vikalpānāṃ vṛttir iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:5993: te hi yathāsvam āntarād vikalpa-vāsanā-prabodhād anapekṣita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:5996: na hi yo yasya sattā-upadhānaṃ na apekṣate sa tasya hetuḥ / ahetuś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6002: atra apy uktaṃ śrotary api prasaṅga
SA15dhkpvsvu:6003: iti / taj-jñāne ca prayoge śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6007: puruṣaḥ śabdānāṃ prayoktā ity alaukiko ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6014: samayam ārocayet yathā-samayaṃ ca arthaṃ niṣpādayed iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:6018: yad uktaṃ na varṇebhyo anyā kācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:6020: ānupūrvyām asatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śrutau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6022: na hi saro rasa ity ādi-pādeṣu kaścid varṇa-bhedo na ca varṇa-vyatiriktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6025: pratibhāṃ paśyāmaḥ ānupūrvīm eva ca atulyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6028: tasmād asti sā bhedavatī yato ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6035: apekṣya tat-smṛtiṃ paścād ādhatte smṛtim ātmani //303//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6052: anyad eva tato rūpaṃ tad varṇānāṃ padaṃ padam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6054: tasmān na khalv eka eva padeṣu varṇānāṃ svabhāvaḥ kartṛ-citta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6058: sā ca ānupūrvī varṇānāṃ pravṛttā racana-ākṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6061: ity uktam / sā ca puruṣa-vitarka-vicāra-kṛtā iti na sthita-kramā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6065: ādīnāṃ bīja-aṅkura-ādīnāṃ ca sva-icchayā krama-racanā śakyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:6066: kartum / tata eva puruṣa-dharma-saṃkhyāte vikalpa-anukrame sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:6070: sati indhane dāha-vṛtter asaty abhāvād adṛṣṭa-indhano api dahano
SA15dhkpvsvu:6074: api varṇa-anukramaḥ puruṣa-vikalpaṃ yadi na apekṣeta nirālambanaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6081: atad-viśiṣṭasya ca atat-kṛtau sarvatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:6086: sarve api ghaṭa-ādayo bhāvāḥ kṛtrimā akṛtrimā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6090: ca / tān api hi para-kriyā-darśana-pūrvakam eva anyaḥ karoty avidita
SA15dhkpvsvu:6091: kartāraś ca kecid iti sarveṣāṃ keṣāṃcid vā akriyā-abhiniveśo astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6092: tasmāt sarvā eva iyaṃ varṇa-ānupūrvī prasiddha-kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6096: ayaṃ kramo varṇānāṃ viṣa-nirghāta-ādi-samartho na anya iti yady
SA15dhkpvsvu:6097: anyo api jānīyat taṃ tathā eva pratipadyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6099: ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvato api kārya-kṛt kaiścid eva vijñāta ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:6102: na ayam iti śakyam unnetum asaṃkīrṇasya liṅga-viśeṣasya asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6104: upadeśe api kathaṃcit svabhāva-viveka-apratīter anyatra kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6105: saṃvādāt tasya ca karaṇāt prāg draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:6106: ca ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvataḥ kārakaḥ kasyacid āśu-siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:6115: tu sva-icchā-pravṛttiḥ sattva-sabhāgatā-ādi-vaśāt sā iva aviśeṣād vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6116: kaṃcid anugṛhṇāti na aparam iti yuktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6126: dharma-svabhāva iti ca yathāvasaraṃ nivedayiṣyāmaḥ / maitrī-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6127: śauca-dharma-parāyaṇānāṃ ca tan-nimittam eva kasyāścid siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:6130: sa tad-virodhī dharmo yukto adharmaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6134: tad iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ vrata-āder vipāko api tu pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6138: prayogas tasya iṣṭa-phalasya karmaṇaḥ kathaṃcid upakārāt pācakaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6141: dharmā sa dharmas tena kṛtaḥ sa tathā tad-ārādhanena phalati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6143: vinā api puruṣeṇa tad-upakārāt phalam iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6153: ye api tantravidaḥ kecin mantrān kāṃścana kurvate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6155: rathyā-puruṣā api kecana tantrajñāḥ svayaṃ-kṛtair mantraiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6157: tathā anyo apy anatiśayaś ca kartā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:6161: hi te samayam anupālayantas tad-upadeśena ca vartamānāḥ samarthāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6168: eva ananya-sādhāraṇa-śaktitvād iti puruṣa-viśeṣa eva samarthitaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6169: kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāś ca vācyā mantrāḥ phala-īpsunā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6170: na hy akṛtakānāṃ prayogaḥ sambhavati na ca aprayuktebhyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6171: phalam iti prayogāt phalam icchatā kṛtakā mantrā vācyāḥ pauruṣeyāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6176: pratipāditā hi puruṣa-kṛtās tad-adhiṣṭhānāc ca phaladā mantrāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6177: tad asti kaścid atiśayavān iti tat-pratikṣepa-sādhanāny api prativyūḍhāni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6179: pramāṇa-ābhaṃ yathārthā asti na hi śeṣavato gatiḥ //311//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6180: yat tu buddhi-indriya-vacana-yogāt puṃstvād iti puruṣa-atiśaya-pratikṣepa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6188: avirodhinā ca saha sambhava-avirodhād ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6189: na api itara-sāmānya-siddhir viśeṣa-asambhavasya jñātum aśakyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6194: ity uktam / tasmāc śeṣavad anumānam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6196: sandehād asamartham adarśane api vipakṣa-vṛtteḥ / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:6197: ca evaṃvādino jaiminīyāḥ svam eva vādaṃ sva-vācā vidhurayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6199: artho ayaṃ na ayam artho na iti śabdā vadanti na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6200: kalpyo ayam arthaḥ puruṣais te ca rāga-ādi-saṃyutāḥ //312//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6201: tatra ekas tattvavin na anya iti bhedaś ca kiṃ-kṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6202: tadvat puṃstve katham api jñānī kaścit kathaṃ na vaḥ //313//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6203: na khalv ete vaidikāḥ śabdā evaṃ vikrośanti eta bhavanto brāhmaṇā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6204: ayam asmākam artho grāhyo na anya iti kevalam anabhivyakta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6209: kaścit svabhāva-pratiniyamo yena ekam artham anurundhate na aparam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6210: kevalaṃ samaya-vaśāt taṃ tam āviśanto dṛśyante / teṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:6212: kaścit tattvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na apara iti na nyāyyam / atha
SA15dhkpvsvu:6213: kutaścid atiśayād buddhi-indriya-ādīnāṃ sa eva vetti na aparaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6216: svabhāva-viprakṛṣṭānām arthānāṃ kim asambhavī dṛṣṭaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:6217: hi tat-pratikṣepa-sādhanāni kānicid yāni na enam upalīyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6218: yathā ayaṃ tat-sādhana-sambhave apy asya viśeṣas tathā anyasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:6220: yasya pramāṇa-saṃvādi vacanaṃ so arthavid yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6221: na hy atyantaparokṣeṣu pramāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ //314//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6222: syād etan na vayaṃ puruṣa-prāmāṇyāt kasyacid vyākhyānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6226: vyākhyātṛṣu yaḥ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣa-ādikaṃ saṃsyandayati so
SA15dhkpvsvu:6230: tad-asambhavād eva hy āgamas tat-pratipatty-artham upayācyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6231: anyathā saty api tasmin pramāṇa-antara-avṛttāv apratipatteḥ / tataś
SA15dhkpvsvu:6232: ca kevalād artha-pratipatter asādhanam eva āgamaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6237: te punaḥ sva-viṣaye apy āgamam apekṣya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:6240: na vai pravṛtta āgame pramāṇa-antaram anviṣyate kiṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:6241: sa eva āgama-pravṛttir na jñāyata iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6245: tv āgama-pravṛttim api na eva sādhayiṣyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6248: siddhā / anyac ca evam āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6250: sa āgama iti prāptaṃ nirarthā apauruṣeyatā //315//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6251: tulye apy āgama-vāde pramāṇa-balād āgamasya kvacid āgamatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:6252: pramāṇa-saṃvādo vacanānām āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / na apuruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6253: kriyā / tasyāḥ sarva-artheṣu tulyatve api pramāṇa-abādhanāt pratipatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6257: atīndriyārthavit kaścid asti ity abhimataṃ bhavet //316//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6258: yady āgama-anapekṣaṃ jñāna-ayāthātathyaṃ puruṣasya iṣyate parokṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:6259: arthe santi puruṣā atīndriyārthadṛśa iti iṣṭaṃ syāt / pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6263: anvākarṣati iti na puruṣa-atiśayo nivāryaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6268: svayaṃ rāga-ādimān na arthaṃ vetti vedasya na anyataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6269: na vedayati vedo api veda-arthasya kuto gatiḥ //317//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6270: sarva eva hi puruṣo anatikrānta-doṣa-viplavas tam atīndriyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6271: artha-viśeṣa-pratiniyamaṃ vyākhyātā na svayaṃ vetti / na apy enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6282: tena agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti śrutau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6283: khādec śvamāṃsam ity eṣa na artha ity atra kā pramā //318//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6284: kvacid apy arthe pratyāsatti-viprakarṣa-rahitasya agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:6286: ghṛta-ādi prakṣiped ity ayam arthaḥ na punaḥ śvamāṃsaṃ khāded
SA15dhkpvsvu:6295: ca bruvāṇo loka-saṃketa-prasiddhim anupālayati iti tato api
SA15dhkpvsvu:6299: api ca nyāyam eva anupālayantaḥ paṇḍitā heya-upādeya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6300: tad-āśrayeṣu saṃghaṭante na tu pravāda-mātreṇa iti na samānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6301: prasaṅgaḥ / tac ca yathāvasaraṃ pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ / nanu
SA15dhkpvsvu:6313: tan na pramāṇam āgama ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6315: na yukter na lokād iti tatra apratipattir nyāyyā / tatra api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6319: aneka-artheṣu śabdeṣu yena artho ayaṃ vivecitaḥ //319//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6320: na hy ayaṃ loka-vyavahāro apauruṣeyāc śabda-artha-sambandhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6331: svatantrāṇāṃ yathā-tattvam upadeśena avisaṃvādasya asiddher anāśvāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6335: tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ katham asya artho vidita iti / puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:6336: hi svayaṃ samitānāṃ śabdānām arthaṃ śṛṅga-grāhikayā api tāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:6337: abudhaṃ bodhayed ity asti pauruṣeyānāṃ śabdānām artha-gatāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:6338: upāyaḥ / apauruṣeyas tu śabdo na evaṃ karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6340: kvacit sambandha-niyamaṃ jñātum īśa ity apratipattir eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:6342: api ca vedas tad-vyākhyānaṃ vā puruṣeṇa puruṣāya upadiśyamānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6343: anaṣṭa-sampradāyam eva anuvartata ity atra api samayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6346: vā kutaścit kāraṇād anyathā racana-adarśanāt / api ca atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:6347: bhavān svam eva mukha-varṇaṃ sva-vāda-anurāgān nūnaṃ vismṛtavān
SA15dhkpvsvu:6348: puruṣo rāga-ādibhir upapluto anṛtam api brūyād iti na asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6350: tad iha api kiṃ na pratyavekṣyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:6352: sa eva upadiśann upaplavād vedaṃ veda-arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6357: tadvat pracura-adhyetṛkāṇām api kasmiṃścit kāle kathaṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:6365: ca tad-bhaktānām avicāreṇa pratipatter bahuṣv adhyetṛṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:6371: puruṣa-paraṃparām eva ca atra bhavatām api śṛṇumaḥ / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:6372: kaścid dviṣṭājña-dhūrtānām anyatamaḥ syād api ity anāśvāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6373: tasmān na apauruṣeyād vyākhyānān na api sāmayikāl loka-vyavahārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:6376: vyavahāre darśanāt kasyacid aprasiddha-arthasya aprasiddhasya vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6392: ayaṃ kurvāṇaḥ śabda-antareṣu kathaṃ prasiddhiṃ pramāṇayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6398: apy agnihotrāt svarga-avāptiṃ māndyād ayaṃ na lakṣayed
SA15dhkpvsvu:6404: vṛtter eva avirodho anyatra api prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6408: āgame syāt / saty api tasminn atathābhāvād arthasya apramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6417: yadi hi kvacid vidita-artho ayam apauruṣeyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6418: śabda-rāśiḥ syāt tadā tato artha-pratītiḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6420: apy andhā eva sarva iti yatheṣṭam praṇīyante / tasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6421: śabda-antareṣu tādṛkṣu tādṛśy eva astu kalpanā //320//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6422: yādṛśy agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity asya vākyasya / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:6424: prasiddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ vādaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca na iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6425: tataś ca bhūyo artha-gatiḥ kim etad dviṣṭa-kāmitam //321//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6426: na prasiddhir nāma anyā anyatra jana-pravādāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6433: cāra-vat / teṣām eva puruṣāṇāṃ vacanāt punaḥ parokṣa-artha-sampratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:6434: iti kathaṃ tad eva yugapad dveṣyaṃ ca kāmyaṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6435: atha prasiddhim ullaṅghya kalpane na nibandhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6441: yat kiṃcana grahaṇaṃ hi prasiddhim apramāṇayatas
SA15dhkpvsvu:6445: vikalpayor ubhayathā api vṛttir iti kaḥ prasiddhāv anurodhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6449: na prasiddher eka-artha-niścayaḥ śabdānāṃ tata eva śaṅkā-utpatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6452: nānā-arthā iti tata eka-artha-niyamo na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6458: jaiminis tad-vyājena svam eva matam āha iti na tīrthakara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6462: śūnyasya tat-samāropeṇa abhidhānaṃ na sva-vacanam atiśete /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6463: tat-kāriṇā kevalaṃ mithyā-vinītatā eva ātmanaḥ samuddyotitā syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:6465: eṣa sthāṇur ayaṃ mārga iti vakti iti kaścana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6466: anyaḥ svayaṃ bravīmi iti tayor bhedaḥ parikṣyatām //325//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6468: vā svayaṃ vacana-upagame na kaścid viśeṣo anyatra jaḍasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6470: api ca eka-artha-niyame saty enaṃ jaiminir
SA15dhkpvsvu:6473: na hi śabdasya kaścid arthaḥ svabhāva-niyataḥ sarvatra yogyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6474: ayogyatve ca tad-apracyuter avidheyasya puruṣāṇāṃ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:6476: jñātā vā atīndriyāḥ kena vivakṣā-vacanād ṛte //326//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6477: puruṣa-praṇīte hi śabde kayācid vivakṣayā sa tāṃ kadācit kvacin
SA15dhkpvsvu:6478: nivedayed api iti vivakṣā-pūrvakānāṃ śabdānām artha-niyamaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6480: apauruṣeye tu vidyamāno apy artha-niyamaḥ kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6489: apauruṣeye sā na asti tasya sā ekārthatā kutaḥ //327//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6490: vivakṣayā hi śabdo arthe niyamyate na svabhāvataḥ tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6497: apauruṣeye tu na vivakṣā na saṃketaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6498: kasyacid abhiprāya-abhāvād iti na niyamo na taj-jñānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6499: svabhāva-niyame anyatra na yojyeta tayā punaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6500: yadi saṃketa-nirapekṣaḥ svabhāvata eva artheṣu śabdo nilīnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6501: syāt uktam atra apratibandhād aniyama iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6504: vācyavācakabhāve na punar vivakṣayā yatheṣṭaṃ niyujyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6506: na hi svabhāva-bheda indriya-gamyaḥ sva-pratītau paribhāṣā-ādikam
SA15dhkpvsvu:6515: sva-icchā-vṛttiḥ saṃketaḥ sa iha eva kartuṃ śakyate na anyatra iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:6517: sa ca puruṣaiḥ sva-icchayā kriyamāṇas tam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:6518: svabhāvaṃ vyanakti na anyam iti na niyamo asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6519: yatra svātantryam icchāyā niyamo nāma tatra kaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6520: dyotayet tena saṃketo na iṣṭām eva asya yogyatām //329//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6522: yasmāt kila īdṛśaṃ satyaṃ yathā agniḥ śīta-nodanaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6523: vākyaṃ veda-ekadeśatvād anyad apy aparo abravīt //330//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6524: anyas tv apauruṣeyam āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ parityajya anyathā prāmāṇyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6526: yatra apratipattir veda-ekadeśatvāt yathā agnir himasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6527: bheṣajam ity ādi-vākyam iti / tasya idam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6536: uktaṃ ca idam āgama-lakṣaṇam asmābhiḥ tat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:6537: sarvasya śakya-vicārasya viṣayasya yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena vidhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6539: varaṃ saṃśayitasya vṛttiḥ tatra kadācid avisaṃvāda-sambhavāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:6540: na tv anyatra dṛṣṭa-pramāṇa-uparodhasya puruṣasya pravṛttir iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6542: abhidhānaṃ satya-artham upadarśya sarvaṃ satya-artham āha
SA15dhkpvsvu:6543: śāstraṃ śakya-paricchede api viṣaye pramāṇa-virodhād bahutaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:6545: nityasya puṃsaḥ kartṛtvaṃ nityān bhāvān atīndriyān /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6546: aindriyān viṣamaṃ hetuṃ bhāvānāṃ viṣamāṃ sthitim //332//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6547: nivṛttiṃ ca pramāṇābhyām anyad vā vyasta-gocaram /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6549: virodham asamādhāya śāstra-arthaṃ ca apradarśya saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6553: ity āha vedaḥ tac ca ayuktam ity āvedita-prāyam nityatvaṃ ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:6555: apratyakṣāny eva hi sāmānya-ādīni pratyakṣāni janma-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6556: nivṛttīś ca viṣamāḥ padārthānām anādheyaviśeṣasya prāg akartuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6558: sthānam kāraṇāc ca vināśa ity ādikam anyad api pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6565: bandhakīm api prāgalbhyena vijayate / kācit kila
SA15dhkpvsvu:6566: bandhakī svayaṃ svāminā vipratipatti-sthāne dṛṣṭvā upālabdhā / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6569: dharma-patnyāṃ pratyayam akṛtvā ātmīyayor na itara-abhidhānayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:6579: sidhyed pramāṇaṃ yady evam apramāṇam atha iha kim /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6580: na hy ekaṃ na asti satya-arthaṃ puruṣe bahu-bhāṣiṇi //335//
SA15dhkpvsvu:6581: yathā idam atiduṣkaram atyanta-satya-abhidhānaṃ tathā atyanta-asatya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6583: tatra ekasya vacanasya kathaṃcit saṃvādena aviśiṣṭasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:6584: tad-vacana-rāśes tathābhāve na kaścit puruṣo anāptaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6586: na ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ vā vastūnāṃ vaktari dhvaniḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6588: na tāvad etad vacanaṃ vācyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6590: tad-abhāve api vaktur vivakṣā-mātreṇa bhāvāt / na ca anyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6594: pravṛttir vācakānāṃ ca vācya-dṛṣṭi-kṛtā iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6595: syād etat kāryam eva vacanaṃ vācakasya vācya-darśana-vṛtter /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6598: yady eṣa pratiniyamo vācyaṃ vastv antareṇa śabdo na pravartata
SA15dhkpvsvu:6599: iti / bhinneṣu pravādeṣv ekatra vastuni viruddha-svabhāva-upasaṃhāreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:6601: na hy ayaṃ sambhavo asti ekaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:6602: śabdo niṣparyāyaṃ nityaś ca syād anityaś ca iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6603: vastubhir na āgamās tena kathaṃcin nāntarīyakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6605: āgamaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad-ādarśita-artha-pratipattaye ajño janaḥ samanveṣate
SA15dhkpvsvu:6608: samīhita-artha-sattām antareṇa api vṛttiṃ paśyato bhavitavyam eva adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:6609: vyabhicāra-vacasām api puruṣāṇāṃ vāci śaṅkayā kiṃ yathārthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:6610: na vā iti / tena na yuktam anena kasyacid vacanena kiṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:6612: tasmān na tan-nivṛttyā api bhāva-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6613: yad uktaṃ sarva-viṣayatvād āgamasya sati vastuny avisaṃvādena
SA15dhkpvsvu:6615: iti tad asya sarva-viṣayatve api vastv-antareṇa āvṛttau syāt / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:6616: ca na asti / tataḥ pratipattukāmasya asiddhir ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:6618: tasmān na pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttāv api viprakṛṣṭeṣv abhāva-niścayaḥ /
